jurvuUzgLB_w0-qkRP2QPg.text: The food was fire, hands down best waffles and chicken ever! And their Mac n cheese my goodness!

M1ToWC2h3CsEoG6StjS0BQ.text: The chicken and waffle were so crispy !! I got egg , bacon and sircha on mine !! They have syrup on the tap for that extra sweetness.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

e1pWPUxTh1PH5Y7W8Nyglg.text: So glad I finally took the time to check this place out! I personally love chicken and waffles so the thought of a restaurant that combines both into unique sandwiches was a must try for me.  I came here with a friend on a Saturday afternoon and the line was out the door. It definitely gets busy, but the line goes by pretty fast. You start by ordering at the counter and then they deliver your food out to you.   I ended up over ordering, typical me. I opted for the Nashville hot sandwich along with a chocolate shake and buffalo fries. I honestly loved everything I ordered. The sandwich was delicious, but huge. I ended up only eating half the waffle. The fries was great too! A little spicy, a little tangy and all delicious. Lastly the milkshake, ahhh, to die for. The perfect little dessert drink on top of the chicken and waffle goodness.   So glad I came here & will definitely be back again soon! Seems like it'd be a great place to check out before or after a concert at the T-Mobile arena.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken tenders with fries
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Buffalo waffle fries
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nashville hot chicken sandwich

0X5mQ1OGujg5-Qt3qoMFmQ.text: The Irish Fries were crazy cold. I was wondering if they forgot to warm it up because it was in a skillet but it was far from hot. Our food was room temp but overall it was edible. Me and my boyfriend expected more.

a995jD6F8HjBM4jSi-cxgw.text: After having tried out Bruxie in California, I was excited to try out this location. Instead of grabbing brunch at eggslut, my sister and I decided to walk over to Bruxie..which had a much shorter line. I ordered an original fried chicken and waffle sandwich ($9.25) and it arrived looking NOTHING like the menu picture. I decided to put that grievance aside, but was met with on overly crisp waffle paired with an oddly sized piece of chicken. The cider slaw and chili honey were pooled at the bottom of the waffle fold and shortly after picking up my sandwich it split in half...dumping all the honey and slaw over my tray. The waffle, being overcooked was not pleasant to eat as its rough texture was anything but the fluffy waffle I've experienced in the past (at their Orange County location).  VERDICT: Overpriced and not consistent with the quality of their other locations.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Original chicken and waffle sandwich

Igy6O429-v1adNvpjUvBdA.text: BRUXIE fix in Vegas!~   I finally got to try some "Bruxie" food after never trying the one that used to be in SD at State (now closed) =[.. so it was cool to give it a shot. The inside and outside has neat decor and tons of seating with even TV's too! So the organization of this place is casual with ordering up front with the cashier and then they deliver you your food made to order.   I tried the *Fried Chicken Poutine* which was delicious with the gravy, cheese curds, fried chicken pieces, and chives on top of waffle fries. The *Original Fried Chicken & Waffle Sandwich was interesting to taste with the chile honey sauce. I closed it out with dessert: *Lemon Cream & Berries Sweet Waffle* and *S'mores Sweet Waffle*... both were excellent!  The busser guy working the patio was also very friendly and on point.. so efficient being quick and helpful! Overall, Bruxie hits the spot for decently priced and crafty tasty eats, desserts, and lemonade with great service.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Original Fried Chicken &amp; Waffle Sandwich
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Seasoned Fried Chicken Breast, Chili Honey, Cider Slaw, and Lemonade
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fried Chicken Poutine

-WtclQgwp_Jg_retkkxuig.text: Yum! Yum! Yum!  I've been wanting to try Bruxies because I see it around all the time! Although I had to wait 30 minutes to order and 30 minutes for my food, it was still worth it! The sandwiches are unique and delicious! I recommend their max and cheese too! I wish they opened on the east coast!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ZIktoMDR0v9Wk90smoLH4w.text: So this place was ok.  Honestly I really liked my food but I was in a party of 5 and I was the only one who enjoyed mine.  I got the fried pickles and the Irish Nachos and like I said both great.  I was also taken back that my daughter asked for cheese and bacon only on some of the fries and it was like she asked for a steak or something not served.  Basically what she wanted was the Irish Nachos without the sour cream and chives but with cheddar cheese.  The guy had to go ask the kitchen if it was possible and only after I pressed the situation.  The kitchen of course said there was no problem and one of the cooks even looked at me confused as to why the guy was even asking.   But like I said, I liked my food and I may be back.

O4pTE1AmyVzoOXHWID7KSA.text: I love chicken. I love waffles. But I never cared for the whole chicken and waffles thing as a dynamic dual. It's almost always been hey the chicken was delicious but the waffles were meh or vice versa or they were both complete crap. So of course as people hyped Bruxie up I really didn't feel like I was missing anything. But having finally given Bruxie a chance I'm sure glad they ain't just serving that regular chicken and waffles stuff.  Went with the Original friend chicken and waffle sandwich. For me, anytime a business mentions the word original to anything on the menu I kind of have to order it. It was pretty good. The chicken was tasty. The waffles warm and freshly made. I think that's one of the things that separates Bruxie from a usual burger or sandwich spot. I don't really know of any burger spot making warm fresh made buns usually they're warmed up or just cold. That with chili honey, cider slaw, and pouring all that syrup makes it delicious.  I'd for sure be back cause it's not just chicken and waffles. They have waffle sandwiches filled with pulled pork, pastrami, etc. Salads, bacon infused mac and cheese, waffle desserts, waffle fries. I kind of want to go back now.  Service was excellent, fast and friendly. The girl who helped me actually knew the menu and had some great recommendations. Made me feel welcomed and want to come back.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nashville-style hot chicken and waffles
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken and waffle and waffle cut fries and coke

av9GRWoN_Up3yRqRfXbZsw.text: This is by far the best chicken and waffle we have ever had. It's a MUST STOP if you are in Vegas. I wish we could have gone more than once on our four day trip.. seriously. Their fried chicken is so juicy and tender, and all of the flavors in the chicken and waffle original are so scrumptious. We also got the buffalo and bleu, which was so tasty and it had just the right amount of kick for breakfast.   They have a fun soda selection and thanks to their friendly staff, we got to try many variations of the sodas, as well as their creamy custard. Wow, I wish we could go back right now.   Awesome food and even better staff!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bottom: The Original  Top: Buffalo Bleu  With a strawberry lemonade and side of fries.
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Original with strawberry lemonade and side of fries

BYXYZIYIW81bk7xVdf2XQw.text: This place is a MUST!!  I recommend the HOLY CHICKEN! Maple Glazed Chicken, Applewood Smoked Bacon, Cheddar Cheese, Sriracha Sauce, Sunny-Side Up Egg between two pieces of waffle.   Only one word is needed to describe this meal.....  OUTSTANDING !!     What they have done with Chicken and waffles is remarkable. What a great place.  Highly recommended when walking the Vegas Strip.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holy Chicken ... very delicious
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holy Chicken - wow
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holy Chicken meal

QcUiyOxbC7PnlWYMuZywGA.text: We walked a good amount of time to find this place and it was well worth it! The food was absolutely delicious and it came fast. I had the original waffle and it was not soggy at all. It was my waffle dreams come True  Highly recommended!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The original waffle. Soooo delicious!

6aGESJ3J2td56HdB6c5S8w.text: I love this place. It's dangerous that it's walking distance from work. If it weren't so hot or so busy all the time, I'd probably be here every day.  I never understood the hype about chicken and waffles but ive never tried the combination of food until I stopped by here. And damn, have I been missing out.  You cannot go wrong with the Original Chicken and Waffle. The portion is huge and you eat that bad boy like a taco. And just like a taco, all your fillings (coleslaw & syrup) falls right out at the end. The chicken is tender and seasoned well. The waffle is cooked to perfection, so you don't have the flimsy, soggy or chewy situation.   I don't know what the kind of cheese is smothering the cheesy waffle fries, but I need more of it in my life.  I've also had the pleasure of eating the Fried Chicken Poutine waffles fries. The gravy and cheese curds just make the experience so much better. The meal is piled high on a skillet and I had to throw the towel in as I could not finish it.   I'll definitely be back to try other items on the menu.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Crispy Chicken Sandwich
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mushroom Chicken Salad, Mac N Cheese and Irish Nachos
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mushroom and Goat Cheese Waffle Sandwich

EO8ap11j-Tc0TOlLEwGtng.text: This place does not disappoint.  Great location, large space (compared to their OC location), and top quality food.  Bacon egg and cheese sandwich was perfectly cooked with nice crispy bacon.  Holy cow!!  The Holy Chicken sandwich was awesome.  Just go for it!!  Their fried chicken is just how I like it, super crispy with a juicy interior.  Also gotta try the strawberry lemonade!!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holy Cow!!  (I mean Chicken) sandwich
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Half of the breakfast sandwich

BbC4rLbO7gmvPZtiLWxc-g.text: Looking for a unique eat? Bruxie is the place! The deal is even sweeter when a waffle and fried chicken sandwich is only $5 on Wednesdays! All you need to do is show them the ad on Facebook. Otherwise it's normally $10.   We went during the afternoon and didn't have to wait in line. Our cashier was super friendly and helped us navigate through their menu. She suggested to was down the sandwich with a strawberry lemonade and I'm so glad she did. It's such a refreshing drink for Vegas weather.   We sat outside and they brought our meals to us. The sandwich was so deliciously gorgeous that a few people stopped to look at what I was eating and even took pictures of the sandwich for their instagram. Yes, no lies!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Qq9LDu9kqPd14vGpNnV0HA.text: What a find! Heard the name before from locations in SoCal but had never been. If you're looking for some bomb chicken and waffles this is the place. The waffle had just enough crisp to it, the chicken was crispy, crunchy, moist and delicious. I had the Holy Chicken sandwich and it was perfect...waffle, fried chicken, maple bacon strips, thin slice of melted cheddar and the topper was an over-medium egg with the right amount of egg "gravy" to seal the deal. You just gotta3guve this place a try.

uqpQhs4JiF1wvmoen4x-wQ.text: Went here on my last trip to Las Vegas. I had never had chicken and waffles before and thought I would give it a try. The Chicken and waffles are amazing. I will definitely be back when I return to Las Vegas.

BoD0bDZ8JCLPewutNoXmtQ.text: Great place for chicken and waffles in vegas without hurting your wallet!  I'm starting to like all these quick and easy bites to grab.  Prices are ~10$ per waffle sandwich.  The Nashville chicken was on point, it packs a pretty satisfying spice without burning off your taste buds.  Chicken strips were breaded evenly and pretty general.    If you get the nutella banana waffle I recommend getting the white cream on the side.  For some people the pairing is strange, so I was glad of having the option of not using it.   I will come back!  I want to try the original sandwich and the cheddar bacon waffle skillet too!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Great spice that perfectly accommodates all the flavors
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken strips!! Large serving

dmnALs-7UZgl_jCSYZl5JA.text: If you're not sure what to choose, stick with the waffle sandwiches. No need to try the chicken tenders & waffle fries because they are so ordinary. I should know... because that's what I did when I first came here. WTF was I thinking?! Definitely MY BAD, lol.  Luckily, I had some of the hubs' Crispy Chicken Waffle Sandwich and it was so good! Chicken wasn't dry at all.  Also, get their strawberry lemonade. REALLY good.

QbkIQGqBzbngH4m_LWyVMA.text: This place is awesome!  I will be recommending this to anyone I know visiting Vegas.  I got the chicken waffle sandwich.  Literally amazing.  The flavors matched perfect.  Chicken was cooked to perfection.  Staff asked us several times if we needed anything.  I also tried the banana nutella waffle for the sweet side of my taste and it was like I was floating in waffle heaven.   I will be going back everytime I am in town.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Heaven
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yum!!!!!

yV4MOI3HCmmsXunWpjaMAw.text: Wow, I have such mixed feelings. I want to give it 5 stars for how it started and 2 stars for how it ended.   Initially, I was completely blown away by the Nashville Hot Chicken (skillet with cheddar waffle). It was crispy and the portions were good. I love hot chicken and normally wish it was hotter at other places. Well this was HOT hot chicken!! Woohoo!   The waffle was meant to balance out the chicken spice. It had a lot of large sugar chunks on the outside which were welcome at first but over time it became way too sickly sweet. There were just too many sugar chunks. The waffle also was dense. So dense and kinda gooey on the inside. I was hoping for fluffy.   Between the sickly sweet waffle and the inferno chicken, my tastebuds are totally fried. They tried too hard to strike a balance between the intensely sweet and intensely hot.   Just too intense; too much of a good thing.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nashville Hot Chicken

0ymNzoM2hsv7ubbS7CdT9A.text: Amazing just amazing everything! We ordered chicken and waffle and chicken tenders with fries. Both were amazing

LgDFoM895223uEkttsiP8g.text: This was my first time to Bruxie, when I first saw the waffle sandwiches, I immediately knew I HAD to try it.   I went with my family for brunch around 10 am on a Wednesday. There was a decent amount of people at the restaurant. The service was also very nice, the lady taking our order was extremely kind.  I got the Original Chicken Waffle Sandwich, which was $11.95 and my brother got the Holy Chicken! Waffle Sandwich, which was also $11.95. I wanted something to satisfy my sweet tooth, so I got the Nutella and Banana Waffle, $5.95. Also we got a side of Coleslaw for $2.95.  I first have to say, this place has the BEST waffle I've ever had in my life. I personally love crispy waffles than soft and cakey ones. Bruxie serves just the PERFECT waffle. It's crisp and not so thick, it perfectly companies the fried chicken. The Original Chicken Waffle Sandwich tasted AMAZING, the price was also very reasonable for the portions and quality of the food. The Coleslaw was the best I've ever had too. Now the dessert waffle, Nutella and Banana Waffle was just lovely. It tasted like HEAVEN. Everything harmonized together and in my opinion, the waffle went with the sweet better than the savory.  Overall incredible place, would definitely come again to try the other amazing menus.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nutella &amp; Banana Waffle Sandwich
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The The Original Fried Chicken &amp; Waffle
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nutella and Banana Waffle Sandwich $5.95

XClVuXYPfS_Q02fl9roxSg.text: The Goods 1. Fancified and gourmet version of chicken and waffles; comes in the form of a taco where the shell is the waffle and filled with chicken.  Chicken is lightly breaded and crisp.  Stuffed with slaw, it feels like street food in a bistro setting. 2. Also known for pure cane sugar sodas; always yum   Ambiance  1. Beautiful!  Very ultra modern and hip  2. Could be a great place to meet up friends like I did and catch up   Service  1. Overall 7/10; they were ok at the register and adequate with service.  Just like a glorified fast food so not like a sommelier type restaurant  2. Credit cards ok 3. Visit while on the strip and near the T-Mobile arena   MoJo 1. Get the famous waffle kind of upgraded eggo! 2. Pair with a sugar cane soda with various flavors

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Slaw on the side; cause I like choices ... but look at that crispy waffle
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. So much to try! Next time a spicy chicken....
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fun ambiance as you can see

ovFT7h1TbS63XdLDUZkb_Q.text: Unfortunately, my wife, and friends and I weren't pleased with the food. Our hotel concierge suggested eating there. The menu and vibe of the restaurant is great, but the quality of the food is mass production. They get tons of business, so I get it, but I was expecting a bit more southern cooked as it was described to me. I ordered the chicken and waffles. The chicken was cooked in old oil, so while the inside was tender, the outside breaded portion was burnt. It wasn't seasoned a lot, so I had to revert to using hot sauce, which surprisingly I don't like to do because I LOVE to taste the flavor of the food over anything. My waffle was golden brown and looked amazing, but it was hard and extremely crunchy. I also ordered the fried pickles, which were amazing I have to say. There were 3 others in my party, and we all ordered a version of chicken and waffles, whether it was in sandwich form or not. The irish fries (I think its called), were okay, but I'm not sure if they were good because we were hungry and had already spent roughly $15-17 per person. Needless to say, this wasn't the best experience, and I'd probably not go back. I wouldn't recommend if you're looking for authentic southern style food. Not a knock on the establishment because again, they have a huge following, and we even waited 20 minutes, so they are many who love their food, I'm just not one of them.

vw_Sq0947qqZ2EB8eAFOOw.text: This place was awesome we tried a bunch of different breakfast entrees. Everyone said was good and even came back a second time.  Bloody Mary was nice and spicy good add one too. Great place to go after being up late!!

5_TGKl_ISeI4UOGjUpnkQw.text: If you're in Vegas you must try this place out. The shop isn't huge but it's located at a large outdoor area so if you can't sit inside you can find a seat outside. The food was excellent and they have great chicken and waffles. The servings are pretty big as well. Service was good and the prices were reasonable. We went on a weekday morning and it was not crowded at all, I don't know what is like on a weekend. Definitely worth a visit, you won't be disappointed!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast waffles

1nUHWmWWns3Bsl63wGdvVQ.text: Hit the spot! Got the kickin chicken sandwich and omg, it was amazing! The fires chicken was perfectly cooked, not too thick of breading and great flavor.  Not too spicy and the lettuce and sauce made it even that much better. The waffle was good, and held up to being a sandwich without making a giant mess

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

MRfKRkBgM0Gnm0tNood4Mg.text: Came here for lunch on a Sunday afternoon.   Ambiance: Nothing special. It can get loud and super crowded with people waiting for tables. The place isn't large so big parties will have trouble finding seats. The tables, chairs, and stools are pretty typical for a semi fast food chain. I say semi because its not really fast food but kinda is at the same time.   Service: You go up to order and they bring the food to you. After you are done, you have to throw away your trash. So its not too much of a sit down and dine kind of service. Overall the servers are nice and polite.   Food: Honestly, I think I was really hyped but I just thought it was okay. We ordered the crispy chicken sandwich and 3 pieces of fried chicken (2 original/1 Nashville) that comes with a waffle. It was good but it wasn't the yummy dance good. I was ready to have the biggest foodgasm when I got my food but I think my mental desires/expections for the food really override what was actually getting ingested. Therefore I think it was okay. Don't get me wrong it is still delicious but I don't think I would crave for it or go out of my way to get it.  I thought it was just okay and since I would probably not go back I give it 3 stars.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

QcsSPR3K1zRAcJ0YLfMWIg.text: Are you kidding?  These chicken and waffles are awesome! The chili honey sauce on top sealed the deal and the little candied bacon bits in the cheddar waffle were a pleasant surprise. 100% recommend.

mRJ089CL7Fad4-1WzLZoyQ.text: So the good: Chicken was tender and juicy. Breading was crispy and crunchy. Fries were good too. Free coffee refills.  The medium: The chicken breading wasn't seasoned. Or it was too subtle for my taste buds to notice.  The sauces were just so-so. Ranch sauce was a bit bland. Barbecue sauce was a little too sour for me. Angry cheese sauce was thin and not cheesy tasting. The coffee was too strong for me. Think twice as strong as Starbucks

_SnMO8-DEh2OIHlanBC3uA.text: This is a place that you wouldn't think about walking into, but you should. Really, one of the most amazing breakfasts i have ever had! I got the chicken waffle sandwich and i was in HEAVEN. My significant other had the el hefe sandwich and was just as pleased. Do yourself a favor and stop here, also order a side of the cheese dip to add more amazingness to any item!

MXeNVo9jLVzuIwNa9DkPKA.text: Love chicken & waffles and was soo excited when I saw that there was a location here in Vegas. I had bookmarked Bruxie Irvine on Yelp and haven't had a chance to try it till now. The waffle is thinner than a Belgian and is light and crispy. We tried the Original and the Holy Chicken (based on the girl at the counter's recommendation). I liked the Original best but loved the bacon that was on the Holy. We also had their Chicken tenders (buffalo style) and the Mac & Cheese Kids meal (big portion with fries). The sandwiches are huge! When I make it to the Irvine location, will definitely try the Nashville Style Hot Chicken.

EU4N9P85HjtY-Fi5swxxEg.text: What an amazing sandwich. Each individual ingredient was impeccable- the fried chicken, coleslaw, and the waffle.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

WyXAiheAxe52m1gzEAValA.text: My friends and I had just come from a game at the T-Mobile Arena. Since we'd already shelled out the $15 for parking, we figured we might as well stick around and pick a place to eat. I mentioned fried chicken to my friends and they were totally on board!   There was a bit of a line and I have to say it didn't move very fast - I think there was only one person taking orders. But once we made it to the front and were given a little buzzer, things moved quickly. It was a beautiful day, so we waited at a table just outside for our food. Our buzzers actually never went off, our food was simply brought out one at a time.   I ordered the Irish Nachos. I'm a sucker for waffle fries and these totally delivered. They were absolutely covered in cheese sauce.   My friends both ordered the traditional fried chicken waffle sandwich and I got to have a few bites. It was delicious! The chicken had crunch and flavor. The waffle was light, crispy and savory - almost like a bread instead of a waffle. The sandwich also had slaw and honey - so good! Both moistened the waffle just a little, which made for a nice texture and balance to it's crunch.   I definitely want to come back to this place and try one of their dessert waffles, too!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Irish Nachos - waffle fries, cheese sauce, sour cream and bacon
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Traditional Fried Chicken Sandwich with honey and coleslaw

6rW2XeV3HCmr0YOI5wipKg.text: The Holy Chicken...Best sandwich ever..... I've had chicken and waffles once before but never like this. First off, amazing chicken tenders. It'd be worth a trip just to get some tenders. After ordering, I was second guessing myself about how a sriracha sauce would go with everything. Short answer, amazing. It's a creamy mild sriracha sauce rather than just a straight sriracha. The bacon was great and then with a sunny side up egg, the whole thing just went together perfectly. I had to go back for another one before leaving Vegas.

tovQpa9-PYmkIuoyYGTTMA.text: Food: awesome, they know how to do chicken and waffles for sure.  Price: great, you will leave with your arms and legs attached.  Location: I actually think they have outgrown this location, it's time to expand.   Overall: this is a self service shop once you order, so there really isn't much to say about the staff. The food is excellent and that is what makes it so popular. I recommend the BBQ waffle combo or original. The one knock I have on the place is limited seating. It's time to expand or add a real outdoor patio with fans.

gpcT0CV1AtNS1vTsh1z-uw.text: Always excited to try different chicken and waffle places! First meal once we landed in Vegas and did not regret. The place is located at The Park it's a nice area with a lot of bars and restaurants. Super friendly staff and was patient with my boyfriend and I since it was our first time. Everything on the menu sounded so good! But we both went with The Original fried chicken and waffle sandwich, which also came with cider slaw. We also got waffle cut fries (not shareable you'll want your own) and mac n cheese (shareable) for extra sides. Everything was delicious nothing disappointing. The waffle was perfectly crisp not soggy and the chicken was flavorful and crispy skin. You can never go wrong with waffle fries and their basic mac n cheese was yummy as well. I would definitely come back again to try more of their menu!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Original Chicken &amp; Waffle Sandwich

-S9GvWAz_hA94U0yW-f5oQ.text: I really wanted to love it. Everything about Bruxie caught my eye and I couldn't wait to try it out when I was staying nearby the restaurant during my recent Vegas trip. I thought everything about the place was awesome until I tried my sandwich.   I ordered the Nashville Hot. It might have been the sauce that comes on it but I was not a fan. The chicken didn't really have any flavors I was expecting - it was not spicy at all just very saucy. The relish sauce that came on the sandwich did not work for me. My boyfriend got the original fried chicken and waffle sandwich and mentioned that there was barely any sauce on his chicken/sandwich which was very unfortunate. We also got an order of waffle fries... which was basically 4 pieces. Not exactly worth $3.  I love the restaurant logo, concept, and atmosphere. Maybe my next experience will be better. Looks like I'll just have to check out another Bruxie the next time I find one around me!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. TL: southern bbq; TR: crispy chicken; BL: bacon, egg &amp; cheddar;  BR: nashville hot;

fai_K-zbRiFpOaIH4SRRSg.text: I haven't had Bruxie for a long long time. It's good to see that they now have a location out in Vegas.  The Nashville sandwich was delicious. The waffle is not heavy and has an airy taste to it. The waffle fries with cheese was also delicious.    We were lucky that we went during a slow time.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

O7-DNWw9UDnqaGPeivvdzA.text: We had a long wait to order. The staff were very helpful and tried to keep things moving. The menu was interesting and unique. I got an egg waffle sandwich.  It was good - not great.  Great for fast food.  Ok for restaurant food.  Overall - fun vibe, good service and OK food.

wWb-FXYBDEIjqF3PmpjlRg.text: Great tasting and fulfilling food! A little on the pricier side for what you get, but hey- it's vegas! The chicken was wonderful and the waffle sandwich was a winning combination! Their proprietary sodas are also really good! Definitely a winner for food quality- the only downside was the lack of enthusiasm from the service.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

5raHbLnWlW4lCMt-fS545g.text: Mannnn oh man!!! This place was heaven between waffles. I should have never came to the place, I'm going to lose all of my diet goals. 2017 is coming and it's going to be very hard to stay away from this place. Make sure you order the BAM. Seasonal item I guess, I wish they make it permanent. Chicken and waffle sandwich with Mac & cheese, sweet cheese and savory cheese sauce drizzled over it. They usually add peppercinis to it but they were out of them. So I used siracha

fdiTqHLM3nHR-hgq9w-aDA.text: The food created sensory overload! Sweet, savory, tangy. I ordered the Carolina BBQ chicken waffle sandwich w/o cheddar w/BBQ sauce on the side, waffle fries, & fried pickles. There were 2 water dispensers, which was appreciated since it was 104 degrees outside! The fried pickles were HUGE, perfectly battered & seasoned! The fried chicken was marinated in buttermilk batter, which gave it an amazingly delicious breading. It was topped with a little bit of coleslaw (not mayonaissey, thank goodness), & onion straws. It did not need the BBQ or cheese! I put syrup on the waffle "sandwich". The waffles were perfect, not too hard or too soft. I ate it open-face. It was too much for me to pick up & eat! I saw a man take on the challenge! Check out my pics!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fried pickles &amp; waffle fries
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carolina BBQ fried chicken waffle sandwich w/o cheese or BBQ sauce. It is topped with onion straws &amp; cole slaw

iAqsilWBWnVRsn9xtJ0eKg.text: Well I'm stuffed!!! This spot has good fresh food and yummy milkshakes to wash it down. While waiting online we were given a custard sample that was Delilah and convinced me to order a shake nice a think but not too thick it hurts your cheeks to slurp it up ! Had the southern BBQ sandwich very tasty and the Irish nachos. They were not shy with the cheese sauce I just could of appreciated the waffle fries to be a bit crunchier since putting cheese on it and stuff. Overall yumm!!!

Bo76mniDrwFY0k1N4RdTyA.text: Went twice- for both breakfast and a late night dinner. Was so good... bummed this place was also in Denver but closed. Had the Nutella waffle, the original chicken sandwich, the mac and cheese, and the tenders meal. All were delicious. Love the honey glaze.! Will definitely be back next time we are in Vegas!

8iL3mKfzhhSx5wyOrNG0hg.text: Good crazy expensive and not good. Service was no so good, dinning area freezing cold

p_3jyJ8BJUUHiCp1hHM_Bw.text: I'll start by saying I'm a fan of this place. I really like the flavor combinations when I'm biting into an original or the sandwich that's double dipped. In my most honest of opinions, the drink size doesn't really give me any sense of value because the sandwich is so largely proportioned in contrast. I could choke to death on my final portions of the sandwich because there's only enough strawberry lemonade to get a person halfway through. At the end of the day, sandwiches here are firey (tasty). It's $30 for two people to eat, and you're gonna run out of juice. I don't mind paying when the quality is high, but I'm unsure if it was the amount of in-store traffic causing pressure on the person prepping the food or just luck of the draw that caused my 2nd visit here to be less impressive.

lkf3pOdr8ZuZGnqXBIq3Cg.text: They got my order wrong and it took extremely long to prepare my to go order. The servers / workers were indifferent to my incorrect order and I had already waited so long that I just left. The serving size is on the smaller side. That being said the incorrectly ordered chicken was good. The other sides were meh. If you're 50/50 about trying this place, pass.  Updated: 2 more stars for good customer service from corporate.  Updated: Finally tried what I wanted (buffalo tenders) and also tried the breakfast sausage sandwich. Both were good.

m5LLHCrd4RbChhq7B1W05A.text: The food is made from scratch so if you are in a rush well then I advised come later. I am the king of 1 stars but this place delivers. Damn good. Chicken is on point. They offer white and dark meat

LxubGZktAZMxPa7gc05BFQ.text: Great chicken and waffle place.   I ordered the Nashville hot tenders but I did need to add more spice to it.   My wife ordered the original which was fantastic.  Plus the shakes are tasty.  I liked vanilla over strawberry.  Plus free refills on strawberry lemonade.

YNnKb8D-Q7oA0EQ-h72E8Q.text: Lovely salads, excellent dressings, as well as mind blowingly amazing waffles- and super special maple syrup. This place was a pleasant surpise! I didn't expect to love it so much! We returned the following day for breakfast too! Go!

bh3qB236KjFf-g7dxgCMJQ.text: A fantastic waffle sandwich shop. It is the best idea ever and I wish there was more of these restaurants all over. Reasonable price for meals, the sandwiches are very large.

Harp9bpZJPVP_b-mgiyDBw.text: Friends recommended this to us, and it was amazing. It was crowded but we got our food pretty fast and were able to find a table pretty easily. The only other chicken and waffles I've had is at Roscoe's in LA, but this was honestly better in my opinion. Husband got the waffle sandwich and I got the regular fried chicken with a bacon cheddar waffle, and he liked mine better. Vegas food hardly ever disappoints and this was no exception!

sQpJyC0BMv1o_LGtRZHTkA.text: Stumbled upon Bruxie while walking in front of New York, New York, and so glad we did. The chicken and waffle sandwich was so awesome I had to order a second one. Highly recommend. Wish there were one closer to where I live!

yN9gQGeKpS2QNcDO13oipw.text: Not easy to find with GPS . But very good waffles and chicken.  Not to expensive but worth the money . The iced mocha not the best , could be better .

M-1BQjrSzBwl0XE1o4neGw.text: Great fried chicken sandwiches but little greasy. I had the Nashville fried chicken which was spicy but balanced with the slaw. Def come here for a great and affordable breakfast in Vegas.

RmxjHiuLJ4oMvrUZtuOumg.text: Bruxie is a very nice establishment right out side the New York New York hotel and casino. I personally got the original Chicken and Waffle Sandwich and it was stellar. It came with amazing Cider Slaw and Chili Honey. They seasoned the chicken perfectly and it was also cooked perfectly. the cooks at Bruxie make the waffles by hand and I loved it. they have a counter where you can get syrup , ketchup, napkins, etc. overall I would definitely go there again.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Let your fingers do the talking
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. It is amazing

tJs0lWedTjioVoST0HKADg.text: So good! This place exceeded my expectations. I had their green eggs and ham and a dessert waffle that I shared with my husband. The breakfast sandwich was really good. My husband got a waffle with chicken in it and honestly his was tastier. My dessert waffle had custard and berries. Mmmm amazing. This is defiantly one of those places you have to got to when you are in Vegas. Very unique.

Polmw47Q5lnsvC9jrNZCnw.text: Stopped here after a late show.  Got the chicken and waffle.  The chicken was really good!  I couldn't eat the waffle because it was a little too sweet for me after drinking but am betting it would be great otherwise.  Definitely would try this again.

TS3YwJ8Vmzetu8VFMgqRGw.text: Got the salad that was just what I needed after eating and drinking like crap all weekend long. Though, the waffle fries were awesome, and the wings as well, the salad was over the top delicious! Loved the lemonades and fresh teas. And a very cute space off the strip.

L24WZoNlSvhS-nofYmRuow.text: So for a "quick stop" this place is a great option. Location is awesome, quaintly next to NYNY on a courtyard, and we got there right before the line and breakfast rush. You go in an order right away and take it to go or eat there. I got a delicious sandwich that was creamy, spicy, crunchy, and salty. I think it was called the Holy Chicken. My only complaint was that we got our food served on a small tray. My boyfriend and I paid $28 for two sandwiches and a side of fries. Typical Vegas Prices.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Holy Chicken sandwich.

1WNM_E1UsQ-EiJRFt9gF9Q.text: First time at Bruxie's. Came on a Wednesday around lunch time. Short line. We told the cashier it was our first time and she was super sweet and told us recommendations and good things to get on the menu! I ordered their most popular item, the holy chicken and my boyfriend ordered the 2 pcs of fried chicken with waffle on the side. My order was DELICIOUS !!!!! It was the BEST chicken waffle sandwich i have ever had! So tasty and all the flavors mixed so well to create an amazing sandwhich! I don't usually write to many reviews but I was so impressed by this sandwhich I decided to come here and write a review. My boyfriend said his was "fckn amazing!!". We loved the waffles so much we ordered another round. We will definitively we coming back here again! We are now fans of Bruxies!

Yg7BKugcM0q-ONSzCdDaWg.text: I've been a fan of Bruxie from Orange, CA and I'm glad to see that Las Vegas has their own in New York New York right next to Shake Shack. If you been to here before in Orange then the menu is similar.   For this visit, just wanted to try the chicken tender meal to see how it compares. The waffle cut fries were good and the chicken tenders were hot and juicy. I would definitely want to come back and try the chicken and waffle sandwich and the creme brulee dessert sandwich.   What is diffrent though is that they do have a small menu for beers on tap and they do carry Stiegl which is a plus! Next, they do provide a clean space with their napkins, condiments, syrup, and water cups. Finally the seating area is spacious but it won't seem like there will be a seating problem since it is located in The Park so there is a lot of outdoor seating too.  Finally it seems like they are training their staff still and I do appreciate that they did check on our table a lot to make sure we were ok. They do charge a 3% surcharge to ensure healthcare and benefits for their team for each transaction but it's not a big deal since everyone of their staff was helpful and friendly that our table interacted with. Definitely will be back to try more!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Tender meal!

xFvdKzaa51X-RyhuogTJWg.text: Came in with family for breakfast, ordered the plain waffle and a sandwich, prices were fairly high but *remember* you're on the strip now! Will definitely be back!

KKWK-ky1CYF4RTad8k76Dw.text: I tried the liege waffle, which is a complicated preparation.  The brioche dough was tasty and moist.  The problem was the treatment of the exterior.  Usually they are cooked in a VERY hot iron that caramelizes the pearl sugar lumps.  They cooked it in a normal iron then used a propane torch to "caramelize" the exterior.  The result was a charred exterior and almost raw (hard) lumps of of sugar.  Better than a regular waffle, but leaves a bit to be desired.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Syrup!

kDoxAMgTBN-YJWG2iSiNBw.text: I'm a local I pass this place dozens of times but the line is always long, I finally got a break and went in and ordered there original chicken and waffle sandwich with spicy honey drizzle, the waffle was thin and done well the fried chicken cutlet was delicious crispy and moist inside, cooked perfectly. I'm a retired corp exec chef 45 years all over the country, believe me I know, these folks got it figured out the staff was very pleasant and they kept it very clean. I'll be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The original! Well done broxie!

sam_z3s8LZdJOvy0bxso1A.text: Damned good! I was full but couldnt stop eating!! Delicious, cant wait to go back. Lost one star on this review because they didnt have custard. I really wanted to get the overall feel since this was my first visit, but nevertheless I will definitely be back.

ZMi4tIa35DittsVeRRL0eA.text: The atmosphere is relaxing. I ordered the "Holy Chicken!" and it did not disappoint. Honestly the best decision you will ever make in Las Vegas.

PANwjyQ0Ng7W0K_YbjJ5zQ.text: If you're staying in the Monte Carlo or New York New York then you HAVE to come here! The chicken is delicious the waffles are great and don't even get me started on the mac n cheese! I normally never eat at the same place twice when I go to Vegas because there are so many food places to try but I couldn't stop myself from coming back. ITS THAT GOOD.

BPFUHuiDxWb_-_fpqane5w.text: Food was phenomenal. I was in Vegas celebrating my birthday. After we left our show around 9:30 we were looking for a good place to eat. We saw this place on Yelp and it had plenty of wonderful reviews. So glad we stopped. I had the "kickin chicken and waffle platter. The food was sooooo good. Definitely worth trying if you are in the area or planning to go to Vegas!!

vqxzGlVgi8w7XQ_TSaWnuQ.text: Super yummy Chicken and Waffle Sandwich with Coleslaw!!!  Ughhh I'm craving it as I'm writing this review! Wish we had these in California.  Cute place and great service! :)

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

-C9rPKLVxqiJ2a44oCijqA.text: Came in to get breakfast and I was already amazed by how good the food looked in the pictures. It was my first time here and I can say the experience here was really great. BRENDA made my experience so much better, she was quick and really helpful. Had a lot of positive vibes here, will defenitely make a stop back when i'm back in Vegas :)

pVSdu97aFir_oOknlVVfVg.text: Ate here last weekend while I was in Vegas and it was MM MM GOOD. My hangover was like "yassss." I don't even remember what I had but it was chicken, maple syrup, and egg? It was DELICIOUS. Their chicken is super flavorful and juicy. Will definitely be back when I come back to Vegas (still recovering so maybe 2018?) haha go here!

dNIPn3VoKvgLQKEptENjLg.text: This place is a must stop! Their food is delicious and their soda is even better. I recommend their Spiced Cola. The angry Mac and cheese is spicy but to die for. The chicken strips are best with ranch. The bbq sauce is very hot but still very good. I have eaten there three times now and every time I visit Vegas that is where I will be eating.

bVJoD4AjYy-4vukRyT-QpA.text: Best chicken and waffles hands down! So glad this was my first taste in Vegas! The chicken was juicy and the waffle wasn't too thick. It's was just right.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

OZtFb7mNCkP6Cq3b75soYg.text: Very good food. Never had chicken and waffle together so we tried this place. I am a fan of chicken and waffles now. The fried pickles were good. Cost was $40 for 3 of us plus $20 for parking. Perhaps next time I can find a garage that does not charge for parking especially when I am spending upwards of $100 or more while I am browsing your establishment(s)?

NrzPEXE6HJzyoXVBc6yZmQ.text: Oh dear God, if you're going to have a food induced heart attack, might as well do it here! At least it will be worth it! I had the Holy Chicken and really didn't need to eat for the rest of the day after that! But you're in Vegas, so of course you will! Vacation calories don't count, right?! It was really perfect! All the flavors melded together to give my taste buds a flavor that was completely unique! I've never had friend chicken and waffles and I can see why they are a Southern favorite. My boyfriend got mad and started swearing at how unhealthy America was after we left! So, just be sure you're not coming here trying to be healthy! This is the place you come to indulge. It's easy to find as it's located at the entrance to The Park and New York, New York hotel and you don't have to walk through any casinos to access it. It's a fast food restaurant with a non-Vegas vibe. Total five stars food wise. Two starts for ambiance.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Holy Chicken! Which, by the way, is totally worth the five pound weight gain you get after you eat it! Delish!

_3ideGNYNeSNFCdsK-1rew.text: Dry waffle, over fried chicken with lots of breading and little meat. I love chicken and waffles and this place has promise but didn't really deliver. Lo-Lo's Chicken & Waffles in PHX is much better. I did like the waffle fries with dill ranch.

L7REWkZkzkL6zKtckApDFw.text: Notes to Self: Service = consistently excellent Food = consistently delicious Ambiance = clean and engaging Misc = came three times and had fried chicken poutine (shared), creme brulee with fruit,hot pastrami and swiss, and bacon egg and cheddar. Creme brulee had a couple of burnt pieces but still good. All others excellent.

2HGO3huWI2usnjvbQbDyRg.text: Waffle sandwiches & fried chicken! This fast casual establishment was a solid stop on the strip for some quality food. The chicken and waffle combination works perfectly as you might expect. They are just big enough where it is not too messy to eat. Great with a little syrup and hot sauce!

vxkbMyT3mHFwJTEAolVsGw.text: Well well well, this place although a bit pricey, the food and coffee were pretty darn tasty. The artistic creativity of the food is amazing. I will be back for sure.

u7TpGGQJntGWJ7xg85LPrg.text: Food was good and satisfying.  J had the theee piece chicken and waffle.  Chicken pieces were large and juicy.

8HpZIv80fHX-rTwwHS1A2Q.text: Best breakfast sandwiches!!! Green eggs and ham rocks!!! The plain waffle with butter and syrup is delish!

hATU_0OwXMDicRBk-vWBNQ.text: So yummy! Food was great. The nacho fries are a good size but can only be shared between 2-4 people. The bananas in my banana and nutella waffle were not ripe yet. Other than that it was pretty yummy!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. nacho fries
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. chicken tenders
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. the original

a3fcq_HGyNr-VegYYGxKhA.text: Very good place to eat chicken and waffle...  Love every bite  I highly recommended this place

YvlCeXc_2VapnsGv-srQuQ.text: When you go to a restaurant and you wake up the next day craving it, it deserves a good review. Had never heard of Bruxie before I found it searching Yelp while looking for brunch. While I have had chicken and waffles, the sandwich and skillet concept was new to me. And it works! Tried the original chicken and waffle sandwich, wasn't overly impressed with the chili honey sauce but it was decent. My favorite by far was the crispy chicken sandwich, with savory fried chicken breast with dill pickles sandwiched between waffles. Amazing. The waffles are crispy on the outside and soft inside. So good. The service both at the counter and table were great. This will be a staple for my next trip to Las Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Original chicken and waffle with chili honey sauce
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Crispy Chicken Sandwich. Savory with dill pickles.

diwMXtjU6KRQGj0gpRuGAw.text: I lurv waffles, but never got the entire chicken and waffle thing.  Are we going for a sweet/salty combo...or are we doing the crunchy...um, not crunchy thing?  What exactly is it that Chicken brings to the table here?  I just can't figure it out...  Well, Bruxie came in to answer my query.  The menu offered many good options:  waffle/chicken sandies (thin, airy waffles), waffle/chicken skillet (which appear to be different thicker, possibly chewier waffles), and salads (the "why bother" option).  We opted to share the seasonal crispy chicken (How this was different from the regular?  Um, I'm unsure.  There didn't appear to be any pumpkin spice).  Anyways, it was good.  The chicken was indeed very crispy and moist in the center.  At the condiment area, you could add mustard, sriracha, etc.  I liked the sriracha the most.  I think it was b/c with the sandwich, you already had something deep fried and plopped with an abundant amount of mayo.  So the vinegary chili kind of cut the richness.  And maybe if the waffle was thicker...like the waffles they let you make at hotels...that would be stellar!    So I still don't think I need chicken with my waffles, but I'm certainly not against Bruxie's version.

B80gzY_7uuVMiMJxfEzSNQ.text: By far the best fried chicken waffle sandwich! Super crispy crust, juicy chicken.. yummm.. Hubby tried the nashville style Hot chicken! He totally loved it. Nutella and banana waffle was amazing too! You MUST stop here if you're on the strip.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Banana nutella waffles and Hot cocoa
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Amazing Fried chicken waffle sandwich!

32TOjXPRk8FPJoWe-jdf9g.text: So excited to say this place is so good. Pretty pricey. But delish we got the holy chicken which what their best seller is. Yum!!!! A good place to go to if you want to brunch in Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

PxKIGO3CuA4uuNSzTalmgg.text: I love chicken and waffles and what they have created here is also delicious and fun to eat. We ordered the original sandwich with criss cut fries and a drink. If you are looking for something different to eat I recommend you try this out for a change.

pbTKb9G0a62S-ts_roMMLg.text: Best food I had in Vegas!! I wish I could eat here all of the time. I had the southern option with fries. The lemonade was also great but a little too sweet for me so I mixed it with water

qYEsaaCl2CepMJYRPulH5A.text: Perfect breakfast..... of course the one in Vegas because it's on the strip the prices are a little higher but totally worth it.....  had the mushroom goat cheese and it was phenomenal mushrooms sauteed perfectly..... also I had on the one with the perfectly fried chicken sunny side up egg so perfectly cooked and the nice crispy bacon put it over-the-top

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

TOElKRFEtB92qv_Es4AAcw.text: Another one I was excited to try in Vegas. Unfortunately it did not live up to the hype. Got the chicken and waffles and waffle fries. Really disappointed! The chicken was bad, the waffle was soggy (before adding any syrup!) and overall the taste was not good. Would not recommend!!!!

fa4ssyntd_UMrXD_Fx6AWw.text: Fried chicken and waffles are what comfort food is all about. The chicken was crispy and crunchy and the waffle was soft but firm enough that it did not fall apart. The syrup had great flavor. One of the best sandwiches I have had.  The mac and cheese was great. It had a bit of tang which was enjoyable. The thick pieces of bacon were a nice touch.  You order at the counter and they bring the food to you when it is ready. For Vegas, this is a cheap meal and a great value

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

VT6CcsfQdawXlsSRwwXm4w.text: First time trying fried chicken and waffles and now I know what the hype is all about. I'm glad we decided to try it at this restaurant as well! Their choices of items on waffles was vast and the price wasn't too bad compared to other on the strip restaurants. At first, we ordered the nutella and banana on a waffle, super good and the waffles are freshly made. The only thing I would suggest is to leave the sweet cream off, that way you can really taste the nutella more. On the way back to our hotel, we just had to stop in again to try the original chicken and waffle. The chicken was nice and juicy inside despite being fried and it has a little kick to it. Great flavor which left you wanting more. I wish they had the place on Jersey!  Staff were very friendly as well. The have indoor and outdoor seating with a live band who performs outside if your lucky.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Original fried chicken and waffle
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nutella and banana

ugGwFYeDQPXHQU-fvTmvpQ.text: Great hangover food! I'd definitely go back, and you should definitely try it -- especially if you're trying to do Vegas on a budget. Pros: food is tasty and really good value, Cons: a bit greasy and portions are a bit smaller (by Vegas standards).   Food: Almost everything on the menu is a Belgian waffle sandwich of some sort. I ordered The Original--a fried chicken waffle sandwich. Would eat again -- chicken was crunchy and super flavorful (I think it had rosemary in the breading?) and the waffle is really light and airy. My friends ordered a plain waffle and the raspberry lemon cream waffle sandwich -- I'm not a fan of lemon cream and it was a bit soggy, but still tasty.   Value: Like I said, for being in Vegas $8-10 a sandwich is not bad at all. Left full and happy.   Atmosphere: It's in a really nice spot by New York New York with some outdoor benches. Inside is modern and spacious. The line was long, but we had no trouble finding a table.   Service: Staff were so so friendly and helpful!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Original

ly77kuVN_PzLfe7Bbu9RRg.text: A friend of mine recommended that I try this place when I cam to Vegas. I really appreciate the recommendation. The food here is delicious !! I had the 2 piece with bacon cheddar waffles. Very filling! I would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

V5fcqYTtag0zmdVs38Ux5Q.text: This place is super fun and trendy.  I love fried chicken and waffles, but I didn't grow up eating them together. I love that everything is made from scratch and fresh to order, even the sodas.  I had the Nashville Hot Chicken Sandwich and my husband got the original chicken strips with waffle fries. It was around $20.  The sandwich was huge. The waffle of the sandwich was great...not too thin or too thick and the right amount or chewy and crispy. My only complaint was that the description said slaw and pickles and it could have used A LOT more of both. The hot chicken was crispy and juicy. Super tasty, but not as spicy as I was expecting. The original chicken strips were excellent. Waffle fries were good, but nothing special.  I would really like to go back for some of there sweeter waffle options like the Creme Brulee Waffle.  They are absolutely worth checking out!!

bssrwGeqw-2c5SLR-omfbA.text: One of my favorite places for a relatively cheap & good meal in Las Vegas. I split the original chicken sandwich with someone else, and also ordered a side of waffle fries & lemonade for only $3.50 more. Honestly, if you aren't too hungry or if you don't eat a lot in general, splitting one sandwich among two people is a good idea since it is a lot of food. The waffle was pretty thin & the chicken was flavorful, and it was overall easy to eat. I came back a day later to try the Angry mac & cheese, & for $6 it was so good! I loved the buffalo kick to it & the bacon on top the most. The only criticism I had about it was when it arrived, it was only slightly warm so it was cold pretty quickly.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Angry Mac &amp; Cheese with the lemonade

9EZKtJ1pdTcyR2ooks_YZA.text: During my 4 day stay in Las Vegas, I visited Bruxie twice and it was amazing!! The food was delicious and the staff was sooo nice. I had the original chicken & waffle sandwich each time and I don't regret it one bit. At first I thought the coleslaw was a little odd but surprisingly it added a great taste to it. My hubby had only chicken & waffles (not the sandwich) and he loved it too. I will definitely visit this spot again during my next trip in Vegas!!   P.S. I highly appreciate the amazing customer service that was provided at Bruxie. From the cashier to the cooks to the food runners (sorry if this is not the correct term), everyone was in a great mood and made the experience so much better!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken &amp; waffle (top) and chicken and waffle sandwich (bottom)
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Original Fried Chicken &amp; Waffle sandwich

62cF29OP6gX2WDf694aiRg.text: Tons of reviews on this one so I won't add much. Bruxie does chicken and waffle sandwiches + chicken sandwiches. The chicken is done well for most all of it but the waffles on the waffle sandwiches are flimsy and lower quality. I thought the chicken sandwich (El Jefe) was slightly above average (mainly due to the toppings), but the chicken lacked some juiciness and was overly battered (I liked the hattie B's chicken sandwich more in the Lux).   All that being said, Bruxie has a fair amount of breakfast/brunch options at a fair price with fairly decent value. Expect to wait in line for 20+ minutes on the weekend mornings.

YMuRp4ZpUdzKEWpiE5veVA.text: I haven't had fried chicken and waffles before I ate here, but I can see why everybody likes it. The crispy waffle with the fried chicken combination is deadly and can make you do things... we won't go there. But yes, come here if the nearly 2000 reviews of 4.5 stars haven't convinced you and you need one more person to validate it. This restaurant is a must eat in Vegas.  Meal Value (from 1-10, my measure of quantity/quality of the meal compared to price): 9 It is on the pricey side, but for what you get I really don't mind at all... HURRY UP AND GET THIS FRIED CHICKEN AND WAFFLES IN UR BELLY ALREADY!

YkMY9Fw6fIK91ARTbVBuQw.text: This is the greatest chicken and waffles restaurant in the universe. I really enjoyed the food. I would highly recommend you go here.  Let's talk about the amazing tastes. You do not need to use syrup at all unless you are greedy for more powerful taste. The waffle was made with bacon bits inside and cheese. That put it over the top for me. The chicken had some sweet and spicy syrup. Oh, so very yummy! I'm going to rename it to Big Bad Chicken and Waffles only for the brave at taste.   Go, go, to Bruxie now! No regrets. Just regards,

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

-ecvUc-zXSLDF9p91j4_tQ.text: This was my go to place while in Vegas!  Food was absolutely Amazing! The dessert waffle with nutella and bananas was mouth watering.  I was not a fan of the craft sodas but I really enjoyed the strawberry lemonade. Staff was very nice and acted like they enjoyed their job. Please bring one to Texas!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken strips and waffle fries, dessert waffle, and some sort of sandwich.

QgGMktVFMbBlhCB81Lhzxg.text: My, my, my! Being from Texas, I enjoy waffles and fried chicken. This chicken and waffles was cooked differently but delicious.  What I ordered was something called "Holy", cooked with waffle, chicken and  the sunny side up egg that I so much enjoy at breakfast. Couldn't even finish it,  and I was trying.    Be prepared for a line, when you go, however they passed out samples of ice cream, and beverage while we were waiting.  Who had time to focus on how quick or slow the line was going.  Also found myself in great company of strangers and the family I was with. Feed your cravings at least once, if you are ever near this place,  you can thank me later.

x-A5Fg6SCoyPxydhJmSHPQ.text: Amazing concept with flavors out of this world. I went 3 times in 4 days! With a cold brew to wash the chicken over egg & cheese between 2 Belgian waffles.

J42TG7Bd4cU-mO90LMCLkA.text: Came here to grab a quick lunch and my son ordered breakfast waffle with egg, bacon and cheddar. I ordered the strawberry creme brulee dessert waffle. My fiance ordered cluckin bbq bun sandwiches and we also got the waffle cut Irish nacho fries. All were so DELICIOUS and SAVORY. The service was quick and efficient. DZWJfDZ-XJIKFWVy6cSKmQ.text: Ordered 3 piece fried chicken and waffle.  All were thinly pounded breast meet drizzled in a very interesting sweet and spicy sauce.  Pretty tasty!  Fresh!  Nice balance.  Waffle was very interesting with pockets of crunchy sweetness.  Certainly a unique place. Would go back.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

DK51RgH9txcxy1PTuLvUvg.text: I have been to Bruxie several times and have not been disappointed . Everything I have ever ordered was delicious. If you like chicken , waffles, breakfast this is definitely the spot for you. Located just outside of New York New York in the Park Las Vegas . When you enter you order and pay then get a vibrating puck for when your order is ready. Not much on atmosphere , but the food is really what you are going for. Whenever Im in Vegas I always stop by Bruxie and I recommend that you do the same.

Lc2aC7KPh3NGQCgkKEbruA.text: This is my must stop by when I'm in Vegas. The Kickin Chicken and the Holy Chicken are my favorites! The fries are pretty good too!   Service is always friendly and fast and the food is usually more delicious than some of the higher end restaurants in Vegas. Portions are big though and I can get by just by sharing.

5iCWBqejTLhOrNPFY8AUJA.text: Amazing Chic n Waffle dishes!! You can't go wrong here with any of of the menu items!

gLgRYcdjaMHiy9-vpz1LaA.text: This was so so amazing!  Their waffle sandwich' waffles are special thin and crispy so when you are eating it, it is not bulky and hard to eat.  I had the sausage/egg/cheese breakfast sandwich, it was A+!  The hubby had the Holy Chicken, it was also really good!  Their dessert waffles were amazing too!  Also amazing that they have a kids menu.  One complain is their side order of Waffle fries for $3.49 was a bit skimpy.  Even though you see a long line, they go pretty quick and food comes to your table pretty fast too.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holy Chicken
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Kids waffle
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast waffle with sausage, eggs and cheese plus the skimpy waffle fries for $3.49z

QiRflHGfO1OTEUOK1rRIGw.text: I'm not going to lie, I wasn't sure what to expect when my new husband suggested Bruxie for brunch.. waffle sandwiches? Um.. my picky brain just couldn't grasp how this could work but I caved and we showed up! Let me start by saying this place is impressive! The menu is simple enough but there is something for everyone. They have all day breakfast selections as well as chicken tenders if a sandwich isn't your vibe. We decided to have the chicken and waffles order and a waffle sandwich as well as share an order of waffle fries. My husband isn't a fry guy but after having Bruxie's he said he now wants to try fries with all his meals lol  Bruxie also makes their own sodas which is super cool, they have a selection of regular and spicy ketchup as well as a never ending supply of syrup for us wafflelonians.  They make shakes and custards which we'll have to try when we go back home to Orange County. If you're looking for a delicious, reasonably priced meal on the strip then look no further!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bruxie  Seasoned Waffle Fries Strawberry Lemonade Cappuccino The Original Fried Chicken &amp; Waffle Nashville-Style Hot Chicken

yJLlkNiyf3Shv-Sk_7E-sA.text: This is a first. This place deserves 6 stars. I was in Vegas for 4 days and went here twice. Think fried chicken is a strange breakfast food?  So did I-until I had it.  Simply incredible boneless chicken on a tasty waffle with high quality syrup.   As an added bonus the staff is wonderful, non-pretentious, and friendly.   Prices are fare for the Vegas strip.   This is by far the best place to eat in Vegas.

152KxdHD7m-ZmtfCd1k_Ag.text: This is actually 3.5 stars. The food concept is great.  I would like to have my food hot as it comes out to the table. I think the serving system or prep process needs to be reviewed because everyone's plate was lukewarm at best. I know this is a high volume operation as all restaurants are on the strip, but it's this issue that will cause me to hesitate a return visit.

6zlTG08fao15wu85l3rMGg.text: Read the reviews and want to try it. Finally we are here! Casual place with fast service and great food!  My waffle burger with egg, bacon, and avocado. Very messy but the beef patty which is all hidden in this picture was cooked perfectly, and the flavor is right on mark. Thin waffle is not overwhelming and can hold all these stuff - Knife was still needed. However, I will recommend their chicken & waffle. they are wickedly yummy. #waffleburger #lasvegas #lasvegasfood #bruxie  Holy chicken waffle, awesome flavor! I usually don't like fried chicken but this rocks. The batter is light and with the great maple flavor. Highly recommended if you come to Vegas. Thin waffle is always a nice pair for this. #lasvegas #lasvegasfood #chickenwaffles #bruxie #holychicken

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

SVecEWKcIlyDs24G0SCgNA.text: Food was wonderful good flavor not much of a fan of the burger part but the chicken and waffle was amazing, same with the waffle fries and spicy ketchup and the fried pickles are excellent

q_dE6APQOo0y7kP7XyAang.text: Omg why haven't I come here sooner?!? Probably because it's on the Strip and I do all I can to avoid it...but I digress.   I came here with a friend after watching Zumanity at the NYNY. I'm in love with Bruxie's original chicken and waffles sandwich. I'm usually not a waffles person because the batter tend to be too thick and heavy for me but not this place! The waffles were light, airy, with a slight crunch to it. The chicken? It was the best fried chicken I ever tasted. Outside was crunchy and had a nice amount of coating while the inside was juicy and tender.   My only complaint? I wish they would open another location that's not on the Strip!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The The Original Fried Chicken &amp; Waffle

Wdy4qkbrn62D8YhuaP0pRw.text: Waffles!  This is quick dining done well. It's in New York, New York and moves crowds through. Grab a bite and enjoy a sunny day.  Were it me I'd have any of the chicken dishes but save room for fries because they are very good.

Sms2cLioR9nYeeUCHIvibQ.text: Pleasantly surprised that I liked this place so much. I don't do chicken, at all. There is a LOT of chicken here but I found an alternate. The sausage and egg waffle sandwich was excellent.  Fresh made ingredients, good service, clean and bright. I'll be back.

TTXNI88Qdv2MI_JcqcTh3A.text: Cured my bach party hangover w ease. Super affordable and it has perfect people watching stools. It was clean with really helpful staff. Yummy. Just peep the photos and try it!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. There it is folks...

RzpdvpbJXOHZNk9ONUN5Ew.text: Very good food, fast and reasonably priced. The spicy chicken was delicious but not too spicy. The waffles were very crisp and tasty as well. They were busy but very efficient.

InZL3l1OSXBZ0tARAYnxTw.text: Holy chicken is delicious! Fried chicken cob salad is also a winner. They also have beer, wine and shots for those who wanna keep the party going with a good meal. Reasonable prices for Vegas and I'll definitely be back, maybe even tomorrow.

u3Q_NKXYiKAFmK9C_hrHEg.text: This place is so awesome, I had this sandwich with fried chicken, cheddar and crispy bacon and a fried egg on a  . Sounds gross put it is so good and you have to have it at least once for the experience!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ZP454aMpcRxx_HTSZc1WwQ.text: We ordered 3 pieces Nashville chicken with waffle. The chicken tasted very good, a little on the spicy side, but I like spicy. I like the waffle a lot, but it came with half side. I wish it was the whole waffle! It was so good!!! The best waffle I had!

6xt6L9AZysUX2sNt-QKSFw.text: Curse you, Bruxie!  Just got back from a week in Vegas and my clothes are fitting a lot tighter due to the fact that we ate here five times during our stay. We seriously couldn't get enough of this place. I tried something different each time and everything was amazing.   Staff all had smiles and were personable.   We're already planning a return trip to Vegas and Bruxie is gonna be our first stop.

dfHRy-aIfdUtnS1jxMsfYw.text: Had lunch here when in Las Vegas had the chicken and waffles for the first time. Very interesting combination but it was delicious. Will definitely be coming back.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken and waffles so delicious
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken and waffles

BaS2UU72SP6HzWCVDZUg5A.text: This place was amazing. Fast service, Fresh Food and overall just an amazing enjoyment to your taste buds. The chicken sandwich was perfectly cook,  juicy chicken with a crispy waffle. Definitely a recommendation to anyone not looking to spend a fortune on the strip.

Ta1yZ32LwusSZsC1eVF4lw.text: I ordered the Angus burger and was worried that the waffle bun was going to be too sweet. But it actually was not sweet at all and was super good!!  It was the PERFECT texture! Light, airy, and crispy on the outside. I loved the burger and devoured it within 3 minutes! I'm a picky eater so this was a hit for me. My friend got the chicken burger with feta and oregano dressing. The chicken was small, but was sooo juicy and seasoned perfectly! The fries were also delicious, crispy, and seasoned well. I had the strawberry Palmer, which was refreshing but had absolutely no sweetness (which oddly I would have rather had a little more sweetness). Unfortunately, we didn't get the chance to try the sweet desserts, but I'm willing to bet was also amazing. Definitely try this place out!
