_vh5lRKB5gQtTbtqxEPETg.text: Great quick breakfast option if you're looking for a delicious, filling, no wait option on the strip. My friends and I were on a mission to acquire a solid base for an active day in Vegas, and were pleased after hitting a couple of recommended places that had super long waits to stumble upon Bruxie!  Although it by no means is a 5 star elite dining experience, they've got all your needs for an efficiency and well made brunch. They've got all sorts of amazing chicken and waffle sandwiches, as well as other breakfast and lunch sandwich options. Additionally they've got house made sodas available,  a range of coffee, and reasonably priced breakfast drinks as well.   Would I go out of my way to come back? Not necessarily. Would I be excited to eat another chicken and waffle sandwich from here if I happened to end up near a Bruxie again? Absolutely. Good service, friendly people, quick and delicious food for a good price, you can't beat it!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

QXTddT6TG0c6A7tTpEJ_Vw.text: My husband and I came to Bruxie for breakfast and loved it! The waffle was delicious, the egg was perfectly cooked, and the chicken... oh the chicken! It was SO amazing. Perfectly crispy and the seasoning was fantastic. We also had the Nutella shake which was incredible. Highly recommend.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

amHpPV4Julf4S9iDgffflA.text: Visited here while staying at The NYNY for breakfast. Off the hook chicken and waffles. Definitely will be on the menu every time we visit Vegas!

7fyZ60ELZN_OY7PUkEfEfw.text: Amazing waffle / fried chicken sandwich. I will definitely go back next time we're in Vegas. Restaurant is in a neat little area on the strip.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

k78c1einZWCMVphW0psAlg.text: The Cons: Honestly, the "original" chicken and waffles was really disappointing. It had a strange flavor and it didn't seem like everything fit together. It wasn't very hot by the time it finally got to me.   The pros: surprisingly good iced coffee. The waffle fries were pretty good. The fried pickles were amazing. Thick slices of pickles perfectly breaded and fried with a yummy dipping sauce. Highly recommend these!

lw4qgY9Z8Eo0vRZ1Pt8_rg.text: This place is magic. Until I ate here I thought I had already eaten the best chicken and waffle.   The chicken has this savory flavor and is a perfect crisp.  The waffle is sweet and crunchy. Add the cheese, bacon and egg and Holy Waffle!!   The Holy Chicken was just amazing! Perfect for breakfast or dinner.   It was so good we had it for both.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

6_sNceavBfD4G-mtrMBVrg.text: This spot is located at The Park on the Boulevard and is one of its kind in the area!  I was impressed to see the different ways you can have your chicken made to go with your waffle ranging from the mildly spicy "Original" with chilly honey to "Kickin chicken" which is pretty spicy! We tried both and they were both amazing! Also they make their waffles thin so they're almost like bread is to a sandwich! Easier to eat and equally delicious.   The buffalo Mac and cheese here is served on a skillet and is soooo good! Also, they were great about holding the bacon on it for us.  Service is great! It has more of a fast food type of vibe, but significantly better quality!   I'll be returning when I'm in town next with family or friends!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

o6PyU0XRFCyhwiUfPsxiUQ.text: My boyfriend and I came in for lunch today. I bookmarked this place for quite some time to try their waffle sandwiches. I ordered the original fried chicken and waffle sandwich and made it a combo that came with waffle fries and a soda. My boyfriend ordered the bacon, cheddar, & egg breakfast sandwich. In addition, we ordered a small side of angry mac & cheese. We didn't wait long for our food because everything came out fast. As for the food, it was good but not great. My boyfriend wasn't too fond of his breakfast waffle sandwich. The waffle on both our sandwiches were thin and soft. We both felt that the waffle could have been a lot crispier. The fried chicken on the original and the angry mac and cheese were the best part in my opinion.  Overall, the food is good but a bit on the pricey end for what we ordered. I guess it's expected since this place is located on the strip. If we're in the area again, we'll be sure to come back and try the other stuff on the menu. Oh by the way, if you sign up to be a member, you get a free soda.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The original fried chicken and waffle sandwich and the breakfast sandwich with a side of angry mac and cheese

__VamyN03JUODJBbBJHccQ.text: Living in SoCal for the past 4 years, there was always a Bruxie not that far away but my NorCal friends don't have that luxury so they really wanted to check this spot out while in Vegas.   I ordered the Naked Waffle which comes as 2 rectangles instead of the 2 half circles like the waffle sandwiches. The Naked Waffle also seems like it is lighter and fluffier than the other waffles (it kind of flaked apart when I cut into it) which makes sense since the sandwich waffles need to be sturdier to hold the contents of each sandwich. Bruxie does have your typical diner maple syrup on tap for customers to get BUT the Naked Waffles comes with a cute little bottle of 100% Pure Maple Syrup (SO MUCH BETTER). I also ordered a side of fruit (sliced bananas and strawberries) which was pretty expensive but worth it because I like my waffles topped with fresh fruit.   If you've never had a waffle sandwich before I would definitely recommend checking it out. All of my friends loved what they ordered. I would say everything is pretty filling. Service was quick too!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Naked Bruxie Waffle w/ a side of fruit (banana and strawberry). Comes with Pure Maple Syrup!

ULJEgmHLwaLaOjYYmh50Dg.text: Who doesn't love chicken tenders and fries? The honey mustard and ranch dressing are impeccable. This place is good for a small meal and very decently priced.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 4 piece chicken tenders

Hti4_5VJaqcYqO43WY2Yug.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this waffle sandwich place! I always get the original waffle sandwich which is their seasoned fried chicken breast, Chili Honey, and Cider Slaw! Oh, and of course must get their Strawberry palmer! :)

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

QBE7vZoOE5GCHKmPh3l7Iw.text: Mmm sweet and savory always has a special place I my heart! I got the original fried chicken and waffle sandwich. The waffle was perfectly crispy yet soft and fluffy. The chili honey glaze on the fried chicken was awesome! I recommend sprinkling some of their Bruxie sauce, hot sauce, and syrup all together with each bite. Creates a great balance of heat and sweet. The chicken could have been a little more moist but it wasn't overly dry or anything.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Delicious fried chicken and waffle sandwich

ULIFFv2AghGZyQ455_SSng.text: Just what we needed after a long day of walking, gambling and drinking on the Strip. Located at NY NY, Bruxie is located on the outside of one of the main entrances to NY NY.  They have perfected the hybrid of chicken and waffles, serving a variety of chicken and waffle sandwiches, fried chicken, fries, and even mac and cheese.  What I most appreciated on the 110 degree weather day we went,  was the huge container of ice cold water at the condiments station. The line was short and there was plenty of seating both inside and outside.  This is a must-try place if you like creative food on a budget.  Perfect food to soak up all the Vegas libations and get you ready for round 2!   I would have given 5 stars, but the two girls at the counter were too busy talking to each other, we had to ask them if they were ready for us to order.  Then of course they seemed annoyed that we would even ask such a question.   Crispy Chicken $11.95 - Double fried chicken, lettuce, tomato, pickles, and Bruxie sauce in a waffle.  Ask for a side of their ranch, it is real good!  Irish Nachos - Fries, Bruxie Cheese Sauce, Applewood Smoked Bacon, Sour Cream, Chives  Mac and Cheese - Buffalo-Spiced Cheese Sauce, Bacon

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mac and Mac &amp; Cheese
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I made a concoction of mac and cheese, chicken tenders and ranch.
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Crispy Chicken waffle sandwich

oL7Ptjt4EuNSAuugMCp1ZA.text: I went to the original Bruxie in Orange, CA soon after they opened.  I gave it a two star review based on the price to value ratio.  At that time, they did not have as much variety.  Bruxie has upped their game, and that is a good thing.  This location in on the side of New York, New York.  Nice location in a little garden court area.  There is seating inside, on an enclosed patio, and outside.  Eat in or take it to go - you are covered.  It is a walk up and order type place.  You get a pager thing and find a table; then, your food finds you.  We ordered the Holy Chicken - chicken, egg, cheese, bacon, sriracha sauce, and syrup on a waffle.  Both my son and I enjoyed the food.  There was just the right mix of salty, sweet, and hot.  We both had some customization - I chose an over medium egg instead of sunny side up, and my son skipped the sriracha sauce.  The customization was not a problem.  Two small complaints.  First, there were no forks.  The syrup makes the waffle kind of soggy, so a fork would have been nice.  Second, the price is still a bit high for what you get, but I understand this is Vegas and food is expensive.  I would come back to this location, and I might even give the original another shot.

zH3anHiNpIHpyQUFLrBmHQ.text: Came here after a Golden Knights game.  It was a solid 4 star experience.  I had the 4 chicken fingers with waffle fries and "cola" soft drink.   The chicken fingers were good; the breading was flaky and the chicken tasted flavorful and clean.   The fingers came with some zesty BBQ sauce and ranch.  I enjoyed the zesty BBQ sauce more even though I usually prefer ranch.  The "cola" soft drink was a little on the sweet side but not bad.  Overall, not a bad place.  The service was great and the cashier was friendly.  I would definitely come back but next time, I'm going to order Chicken and Waffles.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 4 chicken fingers, waffle fries and zesty BBQ and ranch.

Yq59mWcJqFlRjJdO5_z0Lw.text: I actually really enjoyed this restaurant. Located on the strip, they specialize in fried chicken. I had their fried chicken salad and it was very good. They have a self-serve maple syrup dispenser which was nice. Next time I go, I hope to try the chicken and waffle sandwich. For now, I can only give four stars because I haven't tried what they are known for.

TzN5GmjsCUktw095XeyM7A.text: Honestly probably top 3 of the best chicken and waffles I have ever had! The waffle was so light and crispy yet fluffy on the inside and the chicken was seasoned to perfection!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken and Waffles

LvM0b6AaSQczsWvK3M4xwQ.text: Lets just say YUM!!! I got the original and it was amazing!! This should be a must stop for anyone visiting Las Vegas!!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Original w/ Waffle Fries

h_gdKMEkAag6Kh7RJmxV6Q.text: In love  all of my favorites ... sunny side up eggs, FRIED chicken  with a glaze of maple syrup ... deliciousness, you won't be disappointed

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Strawberry Lemonade mimosa
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holly chicken Waffle Sandwich

Ufj3iK6c8IZtl-k0SSrSrQ.text: The margarita and the chocolate shake with a shot of whiskey hit the spot!!! I got the holy chicken and my wife got el jefe. The portions were amazing. We agreed that we probably should've shared one dish lol it's delicious too!!! Best chicken a waffles I've ever had

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

CYD_Us6jGHwBtpnwKuJKow.text: Wow, I was in Vegas for only 5 days, and yet I literally ate at Bruxie's THREE TIMES! I almost bought a t-shirt as a souvenir since this was the site I was sightseeing the most at.  Their classic chicken & waffle is seriously the BEST chicken & waffles I've ever had. The chicken is crispy and drenched in this delicious sweet and spicy CHILI HONEY SAUCE. The waffle is SO LIGHT AND FLUFFY and yet slightly crisp on the edge. MAN, is it the best waffle I've ever had!  Then I had the CREME BRULEE waffle. MY GOD. As if the waffle wasn't already a perfect dessert on its own. NOW there's bruleed creme on it! *drools thinking about it*  Seriously, these waffles are perfect at any time of day, whether you are waking up early (for some reason) in Vegas or looking for a delicious late-night pick-me-up.   Their liege waffle, btw, is a completely different texture - this is a denser, Belgian waffle with sugar chunks cooked in.

rKtZkf9iXVsD0oG__HWhKw.text: Simply amazing. We loved this place. The waffles are the best I have ever had - light as a feather and crisp.   This will be a must stop for every sin city trip.  Service was friendly and quick.

G8PeuXaUZWuHsZLepc6UjQ.text: Went here for the first time on a family trip to Vegas, and it was awesome! I got the holy chicken sandwich, which has fried chicken, bacon, and a sunnyside up egg along with siracha mayo. First of all, the waffles are so good. They're light, crispy, and have just enough sweetness. The chicken is amazingly juicy and tender, and has great flavor and crunch. The sandwich as a whole was a great combination of flavors. It also felt like a really good value. The service was quick also. Would definitely recommend this place and plan on returning!

jclxcgYnEY3Cpp3ViHWkCw.text: Wow! The original chicken sandwich is to die for and the Tator tots were incredible! Will be back next time we are in Vegas

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

W4MTe7sjtEGc0YKWUOMbAA.text: This was legit amazing! I know it's Vegas and no I was not drunk, hungover nor high. It was that delicious. Enjoyed ourselves some of this delish food so much that we had it twice. Most definitely recommend everybody have a meal here at least once during their Vegas stay.

kg4el7BUx-MyVft_SKZsPw.text: Came here for brunch and left feeling very full and happy! When I first arrived, I only ordered chicken tenders, while my family ordered a chicken & waffles, bacon egg chicken sandwich. I couldn't resist and ended up eating from their plates as well! Overall would recommend this place and would come back!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

qmrgmTNXz9fmJ-QjlGj41Q.text: This place was very nice! Food tasted amazing and they had a TitoS  strawberry lemonade that was to die for. Place is a little small in the inside and hard to find seating if it's a busy day but other than that! I totally recommend this place if your ever in Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

9kcfNiRjTb6tohZ7DEMTGw.text: Your hangover self will thank you for brunching here. I got the original fried chicken and waffle sandwich. I love sweet and savory combos so I loved the chili honey that the chicken was marinated in. The waffle itself was nice and crunchy and didn't get soggy at all. NOMZ.  BUT the irish nachos and chicken tenders were OK. The waffle cut fries that were in the Irish Nachos were delish but the cheese sauce, along with the sour cream, tasted heavy after a while. Also, the batter of the chicken tenders was kinda thicc and crunchy. Was expecting it to be more soft and juicy.  But will def come back to try the rest of their waffle sandwiches!!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Original fried chicken &amp; waffle sammich. Wow, amaaaaazing. The chili honey is everything. Irish nachos in the back was OK.
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. A dozen chicken tenders. The batter was okay. Tbh I think fast food tenders are better. But the 3 sauces it comes with are BOMB!!!

oraCx8Q0lS8dx2mtdWDfcA.text: I heard about this chicken and waffle craze; never had it before so while in Vegas my niece suggested we go to Bruxie , I had the original chicken and waffle and it was amazing.  The chicken was crunchy and the waffle was the best part; nice and crisp.   I could eat the waffle by itself .  A definite must while in Vegas !

7RJ8Wv2XsGk5zOHMOfuGKQ.text: Delicious and very casual atmosphere. Staff is energetic and very attentive. Andre gave us excellent service. You will not have to break the bank to eat here. Appears like the line is out the door often but the line moves fast. A must try.

Knbyaw96NJL8-ihSLP03FA.text: Delicious! The chicken was seasoned and fried to perfection. The bacon and cheddar waffle was savory and the syrup added just the right amount of sweetness.

dUd7mtpmFqx11XhJAo0MCQ.text: Came here for dessert and a root beer float. We got the Lemon Cream and Berries= $6.50 and the root beer float was $3.95. Pretty good for just dessert, next time I plan on trying some chicken and waffles.

ZWYoRMtmIa6_927L9rP-7g.text: I had the original chicken sandwich. It was a little different than I was expecting, it was very good but the waffle on its own wasn't anything too special, it was a little bland and more crunchy than I would have preferred, the chicken was really moist and tender and had a good flavor with a glaze that I'm not exactly sure what it was but it had a little bit of an orange flavor, it was delicious. I look forward to going back and trying another sandwich, they have a lot that sound really good.

3Y21BVAJ6JUp_EQ0Bvj7Aw.text: This place is amazing! By far my favorite place in Vegas. Ann Marie and Mercedes were amazing hostesses. I can't wait to go back again!

MsAVG1eUfPfWONPMhqSsNA.text: I got the lemon custard and berries waffle,  and it was outstanding. My wife had the chicken salad, and really enjoyed it. Meh on the strawberry lemonade, but the ice water was a nice bonus. I'd try Bruxies again if I were in the neighborhood.

ztZpSEw7pFPUGDkQXSTDDA.text: GREAT GREAT SERVICE. Everyone was super friendly and accommodated me wonderfully. 4/5 stars because the food wasn't as great. If you've ever had Bruxies in SoCal expect to be a little disappointed but it was still pretty good.

yjAf8EQggHOBg-Y_qjo0gg.text: This place is good, my husband and I are glad that we tried it, it messy to eat but very good quality! I would come back to eat here again!

VRW19BU5M2DaqEapF8BTxw.text: Was in Vegas a couple weeks ago for my birthday and we tried this GEM of a place as our last meal before we headed to the airport! Everything was so good! Young lady at the counter was very helpful and pointed us in the right direction. Nashville Hot Chicken Sandwich was excellent. Even managed to fit in an order of Mac N' Cheese. Everything from start to finish was excellent. Will be back on my next visit! Open a location in Austin!

9RIcNfuZ_GUctnjcZFlA7g.text: Delicious! Got the spicy, original, and Holy, all were good but would rank them in that order. Spicy one was incredible. Nice bright layout, nice employees, free refills on lemonade and tea.

hesciIZKzEfZlIoQTm-oNA.text: Sorta expensive ($11 per item) but I've always wanted to try waffle and chicken and it was better than expected!!!

E-HIP4eiAfYBvj286V6hOg.text: Wanted to stop by the three days we were here, finally did on the last morning. Should have done it first. I would have come back every morning. Great atmosphere but be forewarned if a long line. It takes forever.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Got the Nashville style chicken and waffle sandwich. Does not disappoint! Amazing food and good atmosphere.

7RHbLIV2lrKUKsMbUsCXUw.text: We don't have anything like this back home in salt lake. It was very good. Moderately priced for a quick Vegas stop. Awesome service and a cool atmosphere. Got the buffalo chicken waffle sandwich and a strawberry lemonade. My buddy got the Carolina pork waffle sandwich. While mine was great, his was godly

tKY0LLqJ-jRcmi29D-8t-w.text: Came back and was glad I did. 5 stars for the naked Bruxie waffle! It was the best waffle I've had! And I'm picky about my waffles! I'm always on the hunt. Wow, it was light, crispy, buttery... and the little bottle of real maple syrup was the icing on the cake! Loved it! Tasted hubby's bacon cheddar leige waffle and didn't like it. Too heavy. The chicken tenders are good too, but I'm still dreaming of that waffle I had. Yummmmmm...

ifUhiJiBsndD4WUZFArIkA.text: Awesome breakfast!!!  We tried and Prosciutto & Swiss Breakfast sandwich and Bruxie Waffle.  Highly recommend them!  Very tasty!!  My kids loved dessert sandwiches like Nutella & Banana and S'mores were very delicious as well.  We loved the great service!!  They are very friendly and offered free refills for the yummy drinks like Strawberry Lemonade and Black Cherry Soda.  Thumbs up!!

_Yv5xDWUkCsRGJzhhkL2zg.text: I had the original chicken and waffle sandwich. DELICIOUS! The chicken is seasoned perfectly. Fluffy and tasty waffle. Thought I wouldn't like the cabbage that comes on the waffle sandwich. Turns out the cabbage adds a nice crunch and is not over powering. Clean restaurant. Good service. So worth it!

bgHJoxmNn5CCwV2Ud_JzfA.text: YUM YUM YUM. Had never really been curious about the whole chicken and waffle thing. Was just walking the strip after a night of partying. Something greasy and heavy sounded good. We decided to check this out. I bet Roscoes is amazing but WOW. It wasn't too heavy at all and tasted beyond what I thought it would. I ordered the original and couldn't get enough with the syrup. Definitely going back when I visit Vegas again

aWbJFCiT5kgvPDpMSpCO7g.text: I'm giving this 3 stars because the customer service very friendly and accommodating, I love chicken and waffles, but I don't love mounds of greasy breading stuck between fluffy delicious waffles, I think they need to change their oil, this felt like heart attack on a waffle. I recommend u don't get a waffle sandwich, instead anything else on the menu, waffles are spectacular, artesian sodas are tasty and there are a couple grilled options. They also have custard that looks delicious and decadent.

DL1p8DDgQFJF0X7JTLzY2Q.text: The waffles here are so damn good. I had the berry waffle and it was light and delicious. This place is a great stop for desserts.

B0FMIjzkdm7cqyd8W5EGnA.text: This place is amazing. It is different with the waffle and chicken but it is a great different. we had it twice, I had the Nashville and it was amazing. It tastes like a way better chick Fila I highly recommend going here.

S9BepFi2XJQkRfH55MgwJQ.text: First time trying this place and it was pretty awesome.  Chicken well seasoned and the waffles really didnt even need any syrup since its already on the chicken. Place was packed and i see why. Plenty of food for a good price! Water cups were small but hey its free water! I liked the fact the sodas are made with real sugar, gives it an old school feel!! Def worth the trip!

xqhOXcoR45fch2Q3PeHBtA.text: I love Bruxies! When I moved here from San Diego I was praying that they would open one here and they did! The lady upfront was super nice. And I felt like I was back home. Only downfall was that I ordered the original chicken and waffles and my waffle was soggy like it was old and it wasn't too hot. I mean I it still tasted good I just was a little disappointed that it wasn't as fresh as back home was and how I'm used to Bruxie. Everyone that worked there though we're super friendly!

oAdGGjZy2pSdTRLixJiZiQ.text: This place is great, my favorite is the creme brulee waffle. I love the feel and the little station with the free water. The only reason it's not 5 stars is because the service is awful. The kids who work there are either painfully awkward or just plain ignore looking at you in the eye. There was only one guy there that seemed like he was in a good mood, he was passing out little samples of their frozen custard. Wish I had gotten his name, but Bruxie needs to hire 10 more of him.

btP16fQmiTwz3aHdmRvquQ.text: Not my cup of tea. Give me Roscoe's Chicken and Waffles any day. How you screw up fried chicken and waffles is beyond me, but they managed to do it. The place was quick and convenient. And the price was okay. But we left most of our two dishes behind. Too sweet, too messy.

dftugQZUukZIF5kCGSmvXw.text: Wasn't Our Intention To Come Here But As We Walked By The Chicken And Waffle Sandwich Caught Our Eye So We Decided To Go In And  Ordered The Nashville Hot Chicken Sandwich $9.25 And The Mac &Cheese  $5.95 The Sandwich Had A Spicy Kick To the Chicken But The Breast Was So Juicy And Full Of Flavor And The Waffle Was Light And Airy And The Mac & Cheese Was Infused With Bacon It Was Delicious I Wanted MORE!! This Place Is Really Good And Next Time We're In Vegas We'll Be Back

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

LiijKIflzS3QNX028Rv7Cw.text: Amazing breakfast! Had the Original and it was very well done - great sauce and perfect non-greasy chicken. Liege waffle was spot on. Very fast and friendly service  combined with very reasonable prices make this place a must-visit.

QsOkqJIMAqfePQkH1t0Atg.text: This is pretty interesting. I've had chicken and waffles before at roscoes but this is a bit different. For starters I like the way the chicken tastes much better. The waffles are much softer and compliments the chicken very well. It's not too pricey and it's for sure worth trying since its on the strip. It's next to New York New York right in front of the T-Mobile arena. Try it! Oh.. And the strawberry lemonade is pretty good as well.

iRafIod3CuRRMJr-j7aVDA.text: Just had lunch here and as always the waffle sandwiches are amazing. The crunch from the waffle is just a wonderful sound to hear once you take each bite. Only issue for me was the waffle. It's seemed as of they were as thick like ones in orange county. But for sure stills earns 5 stars. The customer service was outstanding and the people were very helpful from the cashier to the busser. Very polite. What's a plus is this location is big and very nice.

5XAaJwULhSr9Idy7gyJD_A.text: honestly i LOVED this place. we were visiting from san diego,CA and were staying at the new york new york and while walking by happened to catch our eye and ending up ordering there . soooo very glad we did! i have the buffalo blue chicken sand which my husband had the original and the kids had the mac and cheese with bacon . the waffle was delicately crisp but soft inside with chicken crispy and flavorful. i was already craving another after we left ! loved loved this place !

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. buffalo blue san which/ original sand which and bacon mac and cheese

Uu0ePkLlgO8Kxfh-5mt_2w.text: Very good surprise I wasn't sure about the combination of waffles and fried chicken but really enjoyed the Ford great breakfast

Q8AZR8bEKaUm8nG_jDEm6Q.text: I'm absolutely stunned how this place has more than 2 stars.  To be fair, they're thing is waffle sandwiches and we had their fried chicken skillets and the fired chicken was flavorless and the waffle biscuit is inedible.  The fries are undercooked and woefully generic.  The customer service was also pretty terrible.  If you want overpriced bland chicken be my guest, but please stay away from the skillet meals.

i5w0S0QVEaUocgoBlO80_A.text: Bruxie was really good! Large portions, and you get exactly what you came for... Chicken and Waffles. I had the skillet and it was delicious.

VfaNNcDXr8-bsLp9NltfVQ.text: Bruxie is a casual location with good food. Everything was fresh and delicious. I had the 3 piece chicken (chicken breast not actual pieces of whole chicken) and waffles (bacon cheddar topped with maple butter)  and it was very tasty. My husband had the Holy Chicken sandwich and it was delicious as well. The homemade sodas were delicious as well (Spiced cola and strawberry ). Staff was pleasant and friendly. Very attentive. Definitely will return.

W0bKzzRw4G0-VQCvHQjhXg.text: Omg! Their chicken & waffle sandwich is bomb! Do not split! Get your own! Fresh! Delicious! Kinda cafeteria style. Order at register, grab a table & they deliver to you. Relaxed, quiet atmosphere. Love it!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

HkQH_ORdWU_5F1ySdyaIqg.text: The food was excellent! Definitely worth the long lunch rush wait. Andre the employee assisting customers in the dining area was absolutely phenomenal! He was on top of everything and took our experience to the next level! Best customer service in Vegas by far!

udOTaKXgfoCWihUKMwOIrQ.text: These are the most delicious chicken and waffle sandwiches ever the staff was so nice and courteous to go items were well packed and the prices were I was taking my order to go the tables were too dirty for my taste but I imagine they are incredibly busy

ImU0mNQumFoguwVADMAS-w.text: Great stop for breakfast and lunch. Tasty food - good, clean atmosphere away from the bustle of the Strip.

tYkMtQYN4tMVvYbwaLR2Jw.text: Absolutely the best chicken n waffle sandwich I have ever eaten. My son and I having in Vegas for the past 5 days celebrating his 16th birthday. This by far has been our favorite spot,  and have already eaten here twice! From the waffle sandwich to the waffle fries they diffently  know what they're doing here.. By the way don't forget to try strawberry lemonade, delicious!

H9uyJiqkdxmFaa7YScreXg.text: Lets just say I am a HUGE fan of chicken and waffles so when I saw a sign that said chicken and waffles sandwich I was very very eager to try it out. I'm very glad I did, but it's also because what everyone else will say the customer service was amazing. It made my food so much better. I recommend this place to anyone who is interested in a trendy new spot for brunch.

ZJPMeTpDRCs2e3MJ-GAwCA.text: After seeing this place pop up repeatedly during yelp searches while vacationing in Vegas, I had to try it. Bruxie is located near New York New York with an ample amount of indoor/outdoor seating. The environment was very lively with some live music outside while we were there. It's fast food style ordering, so you just order at the register and seat yourselves.   This place has a creative take on chicken and waffles....making it into a sandwich! We tried the holy chicken (maple glazed chicken, bacon, cheddar cheese, sriracha sauce, sunny side up egg) and the B.A.M.F. (Fried chicken, angry mac & cheese, cheddar, pepperoncini, and angry cheese sauce). Both were so delicious!!!! The waffle was crispy on the outside but soft on the inside. The chicken was crunchy and juicy. The different elements and flavors of both sandwiches worked really well together. We didn't get any sides, but we were so full with just the sandwiches - the portions are huge.  I also ordered a root beer float, which finished the meal off quite well.  Really missing this chicken and waffle sandwich now that vacation is over. I wish they would bring a Bruxie to Philly!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. B.A.M.F.
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holy chicken

YVAnHyfBcoNr3mjP97GllA.text: Everything on this menu is delicious. Nashville hot chicken tenders with extra ranch is the way to go. I get the bucket for myself! Comes with the waffle fries. I also get the Mac and cheese and the breakfast sausage egg and cheese waffle. Top 3 MUST get items on every visit to Bruxie. It is a little out of the way but willing to make the walk to enjoy the fabulous chicken. The chicken is always juicy and moist and hot. Favorite place for chicken hands down.

nAJYd0N45qof86q6RTDZvA.text: The first time I had this chicken and waffles was back at home (Philippines) which is really weird since this is unusual for us Asian but still tried and give it a chance. It was baaaaaad, waffle was dry, chicken was typically salt & pepper and syrup was just a common brand.  We've been seeing Bruxie since the last time we went here on Vegas and i must say, it's always crowded though Hubby and I didn't try to dine here 'coz of the experience I had back home.  So here we are again in Vegas looking for some good brunch to go to and boom! I thought of Bruxie   Checked their Yelp reviews, read the tips, seen their food pics and here we are!!! In Love with Chicken and waffle haha!   We have the 2pc fried chicken with original seasoning (waffle that comes with it has bacon and cheese flavor) and chicken had a syrup in it. So prepare for some energy boost kind of food!  Husband had the HOLY CHICKEN waffle with egg in it and he swore he liked it. His co worker been asking him to try chicken and waffles but he can't really imagine the taste lol Now he's eating and nodding at the same time, like agreeing that ooooh yeeeesssss you'reeeeee gooooood   For drinks he had the chocolate shake and it's milky chocolate sure thing you'll love this! and then since I'm a coffee lover, I've tried the Belgian Mocha which was new to me! It's not your typical arabic coffee, this is amazing! It's a coffee with a hint of chocolate in it.  So hubby and I are fully pledged Bruxie fan from now on!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ughmmm!!!!!

g11O8mAqG6avi5s7Nt8nVQ.text: Been to Bruixe many times in California but for Las Vegas this was my first.   The experience is the same from different locations so there is no hit and miss comparing the stores. I am pleased to see Bruxie in Las Vegas as the general area is in the vicinity I like to stay in during my visit to Vegas.   Bruxie serves sandwhiches using waffles as the carb. A very interesting concept, especially those that love chicken and waffles. Other options are available as well such as Chicken tenders, Fried chicken, salads and sides.  I enjoyed all the times visiting Bruxie as the experience is wonderful.  Verdict: Rinse and repeat

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The original
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Green eggs and no ham

9kcuyw3Ct5cZnqfG_3LJMg.text: Bruxie is the best fast casual chain of its kind, and I can't think of any other franchise that rivals it. The Kickin' Chicken waffle sandwich with a side of waffle fries is my favorite thing to order here. However, on my latest visit to this Bruxie on the Strip, I had to order the roasted mushroom & grilled chicken salad due to some dietary restrictions. I typically would not order such a dish at a waffle sandwich establishment, but the salad tasted delicious! It is usually difficult to make healthier options just as appealing as the main attractions, but I would definitely come back to eat the salad alone. My friend ordered the B.A.M.F, and she really enjoyed her sandwich as well. The service was also attentive, and the employees cleaned up my table as soon as my friends and I finished eating. I hope Bruxie continues to open more locations in other cities because that would be awesome!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

JYiD2wv6i3UnlIyl2YpuXw.text: We arrived at at 11am with only 4 parties in front of us, we ordered El Jefe, Holy Chicken & Nutella Banana dessert. I was blown away by how flavorful the Jefe was, the mixture of bell peppers and onions in the cole slaw complimented the crispy chicken with a fresh taste. The Holy chicken with a sunny side up egg complimented with a bacon slice and cheese was definitely one to remember!  ***also try their root beer!!!  If you like desserts I highly recommend the Nutella & Banana to end your experience with a side of sweets!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

j5tZYM4DPKRv8aRnD3_7Bg.text: I'm not a huge fan of fried chicken but I did love this place, I still dream of the fried chicken and waffles with real maple syrup I had here...it really was that good.  Perhaps a little expensive, but the price did not feel unfair given the quality and taking in to account the strip location. I parked at Park MGM which I don't recommend - NYNY probably a quicker walk...I probably wouldn't have visited had I had to pay for parking unless I was staying on the strip nearby.

6WJQUlikS19PeqZYAO0wpQ.text: I ordered the chicken salad because I was already kind of full from eating earlier but wanted to put something on my stomach. The salad was so yummy. I know I know, but yes the salad was so good. It had enough lettuce, perfect amount of yummy crispy chicken and all the other toppings on it, made for it a yummy salad. It was close to a Cobb salad, with the eggs, bacon, avocado and more.. soo good. We might do breakfast there tomorrow, we really want to try the waffles..  Update: I went back for breakfast and had the bacon, egg and cheese waffle. The egg was cooked to absolute perfection. It was sooo yummy. I actually can't wait to come back to Vegas to eat here again!!

80zRAgqLoCcw0NXwAfsaOQ.text: Have been coming here since they opened! The food itself is delicious the chicken was crispy and juicy.  Took off one star just because of the prices. They raised them recently. It was $40 for just two of us

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. El Jefe

EKkf-ltOo0Xz_YROR_KUBg.text: I came twice around 11 30 am. I really wanted breakfast but each time I ended up with a sandwich I got the boss and then there newest chicken sandwich.  The food comes out pretty quick and my chicken sandwich was fresh in tasty. I added the chipotle mayo for the boss which was very tasty and with picked it really gave it a bunch of flavor. The sandwich does not come with fries so that's an additional cost.  I tried the tito's strawberry lemonade  and the next time I got the plain strawberry lemonade. The strawberry lemonade  is pretty darn sweet.    They bring the food to you and offer free refills. I saw everyone leave there plates on the table and someone would clean it. I cleaned off my own table. I just couldn't  do it

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The boss
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tito&#39;s strawberry lemonade

NywMLydeaY6Y2nRHX4waYQ.text: This place is a must go to when I visit Las Vegas. Fresh made dipping sauces, chicken is seasoned great & friendly service. Be prepared for a short wait since they make it fresh & stay busy, but worth it. Highly recommended the Tito's Strawberry Lemonade, they ain't shy with the vodka!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 4 piece w/ Carolina BBQ &amp; Honey Mustard

XmxA9ylVqH7OC_LH-Cf-oA.text: We had holiday visitors we were taking to a Vegas Golden Knights game and decided to have a pre-game lunch here. The chicken and waffles concept is being overdone to death, but Bruxie has decent enough offerings. The prices are very high for what you get, and the menu is limited, but it's an a-ok place to get a hearty meal, especially before a hockey game.  The line was long but moved fast. The thing to get here are the chicken and waffles. Note that the online menu isn't accurate, the actual menu in the restaurant is more limited.  We all opted for the chicken and waffles and the loaded waffle fries.  The waffles were freshly made but mostly a disappointment. They were thin and flat and had no flavor. I don't like syrup so if you drown it with the sweet stuff it may taste better.   I prefer the fat, fluffy variety of waffle, the kind where you can enjoy the crispy crunch then dive into an airy interior. These waffles were so thin that they looked a lot like frozen Eggos.   The chicken was juicy and well-seasoned, but be warned that you are NOT served a white meat breast with the chicken and waffles. I was disappointed that I had a dark meat thigh pounded thin to resemble a breast. Not cool.  Seating is extremely limited but there are a few stools out front and high top tables with space heaters in the ceiling. Always grab a seat outside so you can catch the wave of fans and all the action before a hockey game.

9POc-FuJYEslp__uy1fMRg.text: I purely loved it! I love waffles and chicken in general, and this may be one of the best I've had. I got the Holy Chicken for breakfast. Although the serving size may SEEM small, it's really not. It's super fulfilling. The waffles were super crispy and tasty. The fried chicken was flavorful and crispy as well. I didn't think it was greasy at all. They have a station of spicy ketchup, ketchup, and syrup. I drizzled more syrup and it was super delicious. One of my friends got the OG one, and the way they fry the chickens are different. The OG one has a separate jar of syrup which was tastier than the one at the station.  Although the line was long, it went by pretty fast. There are a lot of tables inside too and it was easy to find one for groups and such. The restaurant staff were super friendly and they usually bring your dishes to the table even though it's a buzzer system. Overall, I highly recommend this place. It's cheaper than most brunch places in Vegas and probably tastier. Yum yum!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holy Chicken!

htqZm0_1c7PZWyhA0nVOQw.text: I quick stoped by here for getting my breakfast before visiting to Antelope canyon. I got Fried tender chicken & french fries, and Waffle sands with banana & nuttera. Tasty!! Feel like this is the American breakfast.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Ntss62mgNu2Pohoorr3fTg.text: We rarely venture out towards the super southern part of the Strip. Most of our activities and eats have been focused towards the center in the Caesars area (and we're also usually just lazy af and don't want to make the trip in the heat). But when someone told me about Bruxie and how they not only have chicken and waffles but chicken and waffle SANDWICHES... sold.  We popped in, and I was surprised to see that it was set up more like a fast food place rather than a sit-down restaurant. (I don't know why in my head I thought it would be a sit-down restaurant, but I did.) We asked the cashier for recommendations, and she said the Holy Chicken and Southern BBQ, so we were like aight, let's do it.  Holy Chicken. This is like brunch in a sandwich. You get a sunny-side up egg, bacon, fried chicken, and the perfect drizzle of sriracha for a kick smooshed between two waffles. If you're a person who loves brunchin' it out in Vegas, get this.  Southern BBQ. If any part of you loves BBQ, this is the one for you. The core of this is the double-dipped fried chicken which makes an incredible crunchy-on-the-outside-juicy-on-the-inside piece of meat. Top it off with some slaw, crispy onion straws, and BBQ sauce, and you are good to go.  Drinks. We got the strawberry lemonade not knowing it was free refills for any of their drinks. Whaaaaattttt!! You can bet our thirsty butts guzzled down cups of that lemonade before going back out into the hot Vegas desert. I'd recommend the strawberry "palmer", which you could probably guess is just like a regular Arnold Palmer but with strawberry lemonade instead of regular lemonade.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Southern BBQ
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holy Chicken

i9E5fWLt0Sq_e4Zgd7efmA.text: I have never had a waffle so light and crisp! I throughly it was going to be too heavy but it was the perfect breakfast sandwich! I got the bacon and two egg waffle sandwich! BOMB!!!! I'll be back for sure!

N2eSNgZK61XNRlXlu6w-GQ.text: The food here was amazing! They're famous for making waffle and chicken sandwiches. This may sound generic, but it isn't by no means! There are quite a few tasty choices. I ordered the original, a tasty waffle, chicken, and cole slaw that had a little kick to it!   The location and ambiance are perfect! I'll definitely be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

bv_qNVj7Fx70r2yelgvbww.text: Dinner time on a Saturday in February so my brother decided this place. The place is a walk away from Park Mgm. We were greeted by the cashier. The menu is basic and easy to read. I ordered burger combo. We didn't too long for our food to arrive. The waffle is not crispy just soft enough for the waffle to break up when eating it. The  fries are cooked perfectly. We were able to get refills. The staff are nice but the place was kinda of chilly to eat, no ventilation.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 2 piece original chicken pieces w/ waffle

Tv8WBEqOzy5nhu7CJQeH5A.text: enjoyed the food here more than I anticipated. ordered the chicken strips with criscut fries and a side of mac & cheese. Sooooo good but beware for the spices! I enjoyed it but be cautious to those of you who can't handle spicy foods. Left Bruxie in a complete food coma

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

o3Rbc-RuChfKseMmfFGSvA.text: After my trip to Vegas, I find myself still thinking about my Bruxie experience. Breakfast foods are my favorite, and the thought of a good breakfast sandwich makes me drool!! Having the two combined (a lovely crisp waffle holding together a juicy bacon egg and cheese) is like a dream come True. 10/10 for creativity!   The food itself was also a 10/10. Like I mentioned, the waffle was crispy, just how I like it. I also enjoyed how the waffle was pretty thin so I could enjoy the waffle sandwich without being overwhelmed by a thick waffle. Their sandwiches have a perfect balance between the waffle and the "stuff". Delicious!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

P_pb2WfjnBNNen5UwdLDWw.text: Yummmmm Holy chicken with eggs is really good but El Jefe is the best!  That Jalapeno coleslaw is delish!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

YKfAUNI3mNgZzAtgkrWxcw.text: The food was wonderful . I would recommend that everyone try this place at least once . I'm having them again before I leave to the airport

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Irish Nachos

z5inf-wpUnaOg-XkWtYUJg.text: Being from Arizona we dont really do chicken and waffles that well but vegas you guys definitely know what you are doing, service was very fast 3 minutes and we were already digging into our food and let me tell you it was amazing the chicken and waffles worth perfectly together perfectly amount of savory and sweet definitely be back before I leave Vegas...

tyjSAnKzQJ5C4O2Ayf8Rqg.text: A little hungover, I ventured out of the MGM for some chicken and waffles and maybe a beer to get over the hump. We arrived to a line out the door. The set up is a little weird. You order at the counter, then find a seat and they bring it to you. While you are in line, the kitchen window sits to the right of you and the expediter has to dodge the line of people with trays full of food to deliver. Sodas are house made, juices fresh squeezed. Anyway, we decided to share a 3 piece fried chicken and original chili honey drizzle bacon cheddar waffles, Irish nachos, fresh OJ and a beer (for a real fancy beermosa). The Waffle is out of this world!!! Full of flavor and totally satisfying. The chicken was meh. I will say it was cooked perfectly but was missing salt in the batter and I didn't taste any chili honey flavor either. Also, when the menu says fried chicken or Tenders, I expect fried chicken or tenders. Instead, it was fried chicken breasts and chicken breast tenders. If I would have known, I would have just ordered the tenders or a smaller order because It was way too much food for us two. We ordered tge bigger portion because we thought it was just regular bone-in fried chicken pieces, not full breasts. What we ordered could have easily fed 3-4 people. The Irish nachos were good. My OJ was fresh squeezed but had no flavor?? Quality was there but it was missing something. Service was fast after you ordered. Overall good but nothing special, except for those delicious waffles. Try the yummy waffles!!!

FpzZ5QfoFrOfkr2_W_Sfqg.text: If you want a piece of delicious battered fried chicken served between a crispy golden waffle then you should go to Bruxie.  I've been here twice while in Las Vegas and to me, the standout quality of each sandwich is definitely the waffle.  It's not your run of the mill breakfast waffle, they either do something to the batter or use special waffle irons because the waffles are so crispy and light.  It truly accents the sandwich very nicely.  Price is on point for a brunch or lunch option.  It can get pretty busy with lines of people but there is a decent amount of seating.  My first introduction to the very concept of chicken and waffles was a parody sketch video from the internet.  The two foods only ever existed separately in my mind before then--who knew the pairing of these two could be so tasty?

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Back: The Original. Front: Holy Chicken!
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

kIUXT4pmOAKaoQDH9xEqSw.text: Holy crap the food was bomb AF!! Definitely my go to spot from now on. Came home and I'm already craving some more.

9DCvQAIyUuzs_I-_Y2OOjQ.text: I love a good place that sells chicken tenders and waffle fries at 9am! Also really good michelada and mimosa! Would deff recommend, close to New York New York and park MGM

SqmPUpcf1oupbdHrDEb6eA.text: I had to stop here while I was in Las Vegas, the best chicken and waffle (with bacon and an egg) sandwich I have ever had! I also ordered the bacon Mac and cheese, it was a little salty but good. It was $13 for the sandwich and $5 for the Mac and cheese. Coming here was definitely worth it!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scrambled egg
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sunny side up egg

ba4AS6QOVUjW9SFPZ494BQ.text: What a great breakfast. Had family of 8 go. Line looked long but it moved pretty fast. Everyone enjoyed the food very much. Most had the Holy Chicken and it was awesome. Drinks were great as well.

ArQKw7zvj4mOTNQAMwS2Tw.text: As always it's good. Can't remember what we got but it was saltier than normal, but this place is a good quick go to for chicken and waffles.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

BmTmdVS6XUW2tTauUzhAtg.text: We came here at 9:50 on Friday morning,there was no wait.Each dish was about 11-13 dollars and reasonable price and great food.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nutella &amp; Banana Nutella &amp; Banana
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bacon, Egg &amp; Cheddar Bacon, Egg &amp; Cheddar

g3ipBemPMnucmPS9dBbK7g.text: Worth walking to the end of the strip for Bruxie. You know a place is good when there's a line out front. Thankfully it moves fairly quickly and we were able to get our order in.  We did the 1 slider waffle sandwich and 1 slider bun deal so we could try more options. Ordered the crispy chicken and waffle slider with the cluckin' BBQ bun and they were both very delicious. Everything was so crispy, as it should be, and the flavors of both really came through. We also ordered fried pickles on the side and they were just as good. Thicker cut pickles than I expected but fried to crispy perfection with a nice tang to go well with our sliders. Very excited since I recently heard there is also on in LA so I don't have to drive Vegas just to fill a craving. Hopefully next time I have space for dessert waffles. 2 sliders for each of us was already very filling!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Delicious!

wCChfYTFqzFX_W3PYXLrIw.text: Came across this place while looking for places to eat. So of course I busted out my trusty yelp app. Lots of good reviews and the thought of chicken and waffles seemed satisfying at the time. So we ordered the chicken and waffles and the Holy moly chicken waffle sandwich. Our meal took awhile to get to us. Once we got it, the chicken was freshly cooked and very juicy. It was on the small side for the price we paid.  Other than that, service was ok. Would I be back? Maybe. Maybe I will give it a second chance. Will see.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holy chicken waffle sandwich
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fried chicken waffles

eDL8xgjMFpeBK_V2G0Fpig.text: The place place to go for some good chicken and waffles. I'm glad they opened one in vegas, considering they have it only in california.  I came with my family and we ordered:  The original fried chicken and waffle sandwich The waffle was cooked perfectly. It was soft and light with a crunch in every bite. Chicken was also juicy inside. It had some coleslaw inside the sandwich. Always a good choice to try for a waffle sandwich.  The original seasoned chicken tenders These tenders are pretty big. Juicy in every bite. They also come with waffle cut fries and ranch on the side. The only problem for me was, the breading and seasoning outside of the tenders was a bit too salty for me.   Kickin chicken tenders Very similar to the nashville hot chicken. Had a good spicy kick to it. Juciy chicken in every bite. But it is oily..but good.   Irish nachos For me I don't think it is worth it. Its basically waffle fries with cheese all over and small pieces of bacon. It was ok.  Overall, they know how to do good chicken and waffles. Whether its with a sandwich, tenders or even seperately. It's a must try for those who haven't tried it.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The original fried chicken sanwich
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Irish nachos..it was ok
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Kickin chicken and original seasoned chicken tenders

5UB34BkHRc_Ifoq8f5cmqQ.text: Had to try this place after seeing it on instagram and totally worth the wait since it's a busy place! Visited in Vegas and Los Angeles. Delicious waffles and crispy chicken!! Must try

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. chicken sandwich, waffle fries and pink lemonade !

zP0GVeI0Kuwq9fEfD3pESQ.text: Yummmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmy!! This place is located in the Park on LV blvd.  They have fresh juicy crispy buttermilk chicken tenders, fries and a waffles. We had the Nashville style chicken and it was spicy juicy goodness. The staff was very attentive and friendly. The place is very clean and the vibe was hip.   Im already craving them for breakfast!! The pricing is very reasonable. I reccommend getting 6 tenders, fries and a side 2 waffles all to share for 20.00 The portions are pretty large.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hit the spot!!

C1a0-qNCmnB4CeCpqlWBWw.text: Whenever I'm in Vegas, I mostly spend my time in the 'burbs and rarely go to the strip, but since we were staying on the strip a few days on this trip, this is one of the places I wanted to try.  It was pretty damn delicious.  I'm like Garfield The Cat who's theory is "If it's not deep fried, it's not worth eating" and the crispy 2 piece Fried Chicken definitely fit the bill.  I got the Nashville Hot version that came with a bacon cheddar waffle and some pickles.  The savory waffle was topped with maple butter and chunks of pearl sugar and I gotta say, the crunchy chunks of sugar was really addicting.  The mix of the sweet, savory, spicy, chewy, crunchy, and creamy definitely fit into the category of "guilty pleasure".  One thing I would be critical about is the chicken was super greasy but it was piping hot so it obviously came straight from the fryer to my tray.  Other than that, the staff was friendly and quickly cleared tables as people finished so even though it was crowded, waiting for a table wasn't a problem at all.  Next time, I need to try one of the waffle sandwiches or one of the dessert waffles.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The fried chicken was delicious but boy is it greasy!
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nashville hot 2 piece fried chicken
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nashville hot sandwich

H7QySq8iUGf4kvXhilVjgA.text: I've been to Bruxie in CA, which is why I came to this one...I'll stick to the ones in CA.   We had some friends so bought 5 meals. I split a meal with my mom, the 6 piece strips. She got the spicy ones and I got the regular ones, 3 each.   Food came out pretty quick which was great.   Once we started eating things were good until I quickly realized they did not give us the regular strips.   My mouth was on fire and I was not able to enjoy my meal so my mom took 3 of the strips back inside to switch them for regular. The guy at the register argued with her and told her they were not spicy, she took them inside so someone could have tried them but they argued instead.   I wouldn't come back to this location.

Wqp9IhD0KfmgNimNxfdNew.text: This was one of my favorite places to eat at while on vacation. There was a bit of wait,  but today worth it! This place is amazing, as the chicken is so seasoned and moist! Ate a a few different chicken places and this one was by far the best!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Crispy chicken sandwich with waffle fries. Holy chicken in the back.

4KOSOB_lqU5x9IAXHWBDrw.text: Lots of great reviews so decided to give it a try. I was not disappointed. Great service and they bring the food to you.   We tried both the plain waffles and some sandwiches. Waffles are crispy on the outside and moist and soft on the inside. The fried chicken in the sandwich was a bit greasy in the best way and perfectly seasoned.  Glad I tried this place. I hope we get one in NYC soon.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

tAGJoeMPNvTFzMFCrGnMxA.text: I'm a big fan of deep fried chicken, but I'm an ever bigger fan of chicken with waffles. I've had some pretty delicious chicken and waffles before, however, this place does it very different. I was very appreciative of the sandwich style that they had at this restaurant. I absolutely love the perfectly made waffles and the perfectly fried chicken. Since I'm a heavy dipper, I love that they keep the sauce out so you can choose however much you want without continuously bothering the workers. I was also able to try the fries and the fried pickles - so good! It's very casual dining here. Super busy so you have to find a seat which might take a few minutes. I would recommend this place as it has delicious food for a reasonable price! I promise you'll be full by the time you're done with a meal!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Classic chicken and waffle sandwich

mMYo0F09FioiU180u_xryQ.text: This place is very unassuming and looks like your standard place such as Chipotle or other establishments, but the chicken waffle blew me away. Definitely stop by this if you're hungry for a good meal that's a little different.

yf7elje7NeaOqgAMF0dv6w.text: Love thisd place and the price is reasonable as well. We ordered the Holly Chicken Waffle and I must say the Siracha Mayo sauce is tasty. Chicken is fried perfect.we will come back tomorrow for a diff. Items!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holly Chicken Waffle!

bWASs2SqA9M7ltug9NYCQg.text: This was one of my favorite restaurants in Vegas! The food was amazing and the service was great! I will definitely be eating here again next time I'm in Vegas. It was very reasonably priced. I could see myself eating here for breakfast, lunch, or dinner.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

1lUNdcLORqJLG51S2zFcAQ.text: Expect to wait in line because the demand is pretty high. It's no doubt that the line goes out the door. This place has amazing quality food. My order was exactly how I requested to be (tweaked a little on the add ons). You order up front and you pick where you want to be seated. I thought our table and chairs would be sticky because so much syrup gets used but it was extremely clean. The staff made sure that after every guest they cleaned and wiped down the entire area before the next person sat. I can't wait to come back to Vegas and eat here again.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

0i9EmeafzE8i4TVlYhX52Q.text: So we all know there are as many dining options as slot machines in Vegas But This place is not to missed Who doesn't love waffles and fried chicken and then they put them together heavenly We had the original chicken and waffle Sammie and an original 2 piece chicken AND no up charge for all white meat this also comes with a 1/2 bacon cheddar waffle  There are three options for chicken spice we both had original and loved it spicy but not too Counter help was awesome explained the food  options They quickly and pleasantly cleaned up the table litter not a job I would love not only does the chicken come drizzled with syrup but you can get cups of it from the condiment counter  We are only sorry we did not find this gem earlier

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

MWONxcdmYqGRM5bG5TUizA.text: Amazing waffles and chicken. Everything is so fresh and delicious. The menu seems small especially if you're a vegetarian but there's lots of different options/flavour types. The Nutella waffle is good but the creme brulee waffle is to die for. Definitely would recommend this to others and I will be back! Prices are fair, they offer free water on the side, they have outdoor seating for nice weather days. For large groups there's only one seating option at the back to fit everyone (bar style) otherwise outside there's more seating.

JfCQiVVExLE7Sw0R428fiQ.text: I have been to Chicken and Waffle specialty restaurants in almost every corner of this country, this is by far one of the best! The staff is friendly, the food is amazing, and the location is close to so many great Vegas locations!!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

HnvqgVTwCy9bt-qG_iMy-Q.text: You know... I like you Bruxie. I do.  I was going to see John Mayer at the T-Mobile arena and I thought, "do I REALLY want to power through some sketch arena microwavable food right now?" I decided I didn't. My usual alternative for a while has been Shake Shack. Because no one can argue their burgers are on point. But I decided to give Bruxie a chance that day. Was not disappointed.  Naturally I went with the chicken & waffle option (because what does "health" mean in America, am I right?), and the chicken was so juicy that Notorious BIG made a song about it... Juicy. I will say I've had better waffles as chicken partners before, but that's not to say it was bad. It was still pretty good. You have to be something really special to mess that combo up, and fortunately they were the other kind of special. The good kind.   I opted out of the drink and she offered me a water cup anyway. I didn't even have to ask for it. That's some nice hospitality. I appreciate the little things. It was VERY well priced for the strip in my opinion and I will be back for more artery damaging goodness in the near future.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. To go order, if you want it.
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holy Chicken Sandwich.
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu for standards

3VgdZOaPi4bohbhOG-gt_Q.text: This is one of the times where the food made me say wow. Had the chicken waffle egg sandwich and All I can saw is that it was amazing. Definitely worth a stop.

E5tLJiMr10TP9_TdJk-grg.text: The waffle was way too greasy for me. The drinks are filled a tad bit above halfways with so much ice that you have to constantly get up and ask for a refill which takes a while with a long line at the register.

uM6JOYSTClO7dAu8-NRikw.text: Food is amazing and tasty so 5 star on the core menu for sure, however, just way too much of a heavy feeling after we were done. Couldn't even finish a bbq chicken sandwich, one fry and one egg waffle sandwich. As for the house made sauces, didn't hit the mark for me but the food doesn't even need them at all. Prices were not bad for the quality so definitely recommend trying this place out, just suggest ordering lite as the whole menu looks very filling.

zRchguEDpw6fdGHHNUuVeA.text: Food was pretty good, but I don't think the chicken and waffle sandwich was worth $12 when it comes with no sides or drinks or anything.  Wish they would lower their prices a bit or give you more for your money. Orders came out pretty quick, just not a fan of the cost.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Original Chicken and Waffle Sandwich

886x9Iz_h3ok6V0v0eCKwA.text: This place look very appetizing on Yelp. We ordered the Holy Chicken which is the signature chicken and waffle sandwich. It looked amazing and actually didn't taste bad, BUT the chicken was a weird grayish color, completely turned our appetites upsides down. We just removed the chicken and ate the waffle with egg and bacon, kind of defeats the purpose! Ohhh.. the strawberry lemonade mimosa was pretty good! Just looking out for my fellow Yelpers!!!

_vgHcgzrKyvi9_pa2J5_RA.text: I have been trying to pop in here for a long time now and finally got a chance today. It was worth it! I had the Holy Chicken sandwich which was a perfectly fried chicken breast and coated in syrup. It had some sort of sriracha mayo sauce, bacon and and egg with cheese all wrapped up in a crispy waffle. When I bit into it all the flavors complimented each other well and the egg melted into the breading of the chicken perfectly. This is a must do for breakfast and I think probably lunch too.

LFOrCX5zkkIGbPHprrmIVg.text: Highlight of the strip, minus that boss taco bell. Food was very good and fresh, service was great and very friendly, wish i got more then just the kicken chicken tenders. Should of went again before i left crap las vegas to get that waffle! Oh well.

syauqDkQ2Gsry6q4VJxwAg.text: Brixie would do well in SF Bay Area - hope they open one up there soon.  Love this casual place that serves great chicken and waffle sandwiches at reasonable price - especially for being on the strip!  Great shakes too.  Fast friendly service and great for children.

fdk3NPb9v_-JBsFkap030A.text: I enjoyed the waffles and the chicken was seasoned and hot! Wish the butter was softer and the waffle style options were available with any order rather order a la carte and paying and arm and a leg for the convenience. Would have given it 4 stars with the exception of a bottled water being 7.00, yes 7.00! I'm all for overpaying for items while on vacation but that's ridiculous! Otherwise it's worth the visit.

_W8dijpX49RUDt1fF1QRFA.text: I'm a big chicken and waffle fan, but I've never had it quite like this. Yelp brought me here as I was looking for a new place I hadn't been before around this area of the strip.   I went with the buffalo bleu waffle chicken sandwich along with the side of fries. The sandwich is a great size portion, however I do wish you'd get more fries. I like buffalo chicken, however I've never had it with waffles. For my taste buds, it wasn't the best combination. The sandwich was good, and I love the concept, but my tongue didn't agree with this pairing. For me, I'd go with the original fried chicken and waffle sandwich next time I go.  The lemonade is excellent here, you'll definitely be wanting more. Staff was cool, and always checked up as we are and kept our drinks full. As a regular Vegas traveler, this place I will be back and try more options they have here.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Buffalo Bleu Fried Chicken w/ fries

v4JfCvQf3jDdrhqJys9kNA.text: Loved my chicken and waffles brunch. The line was long, but it moved quickly. We found a table and we were mostly silent as we ate our delicious meal. The coffee was good too!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

2vKnRxh6jpVdYdykyYai0g.text: I loved everything about this place. I had the original seasoned chicken, which is fried chicken with glazed chili honey. The chicken comes with a cheddar bacon waffle. On the side. The chicken was tender and seasoned so well besides the chili honey. The waffle was sweet and savory, I didn't even use syrup. I also tried the Irish nachos which are basically cheese fries. Those were amazing as well. I will definitely come back to this place!

JbnxEzdbmMxID4IdUepSzQ.text: I was so excited to visit Vegas and enjoy a meal at Bruxies but once my family got inside we were treat with an attitude by the Hispanic fellow I believe his name was Jose( I am bad a names). Afterwards my lil one went to the cashier and ordered a  ice cream to have after his meal. A different guy started talking in Spanish and laughing totally ignoring my 5year old. Food seems thrown together without much respect. The whole time the servers their were talking Spanish and they looked as if they were laughing and pointing at customers through the large mirror. Very disturbing and distasteful. I've been to a different bruxie and know the owners Kelly and Jean from experience and this place doesn't live up to their reputation of customer satisfaction. The girls did ok. It's the guys that need to go through more training. Will not be returning and I certainly DO NOT recommend this location to anyone. Save yourself the issues and enjoy your vacation lunch and dinner elsewhere.

imzDu3-8KZggDsQ8fhL2bg.text: Amazing, amazing chicken and waffle sandwiches. Came here 2 days in a row. I got the original chicken waffle sandwich both days, while the hubs tried the Holy Chicken one day and the Southern BBQ the next. All were stellar. If you sign up for their mailing list, you get $5 off your first order.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Original and the Holy Chicken!
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Original and the Southern BBQ

Ho9qpBp9eXZztN0Dfr5FdA.text: This place is amazing! They have very reasonable prices for the strip & the food is great!  The green eggs & ham is yummy if you like pesto. You also can't go wrong with Nutella & bananas! And the OJ is fresh squeezed! This is my new go to for breakfast on the strip!

357r5Cud6j7YGfG38x9HrA.text: Best chicken and waffles! Variety of different waffle sandwiches. This a must visit place when in Vegas. The atmosphere is casual and trendy. This place receives a lot of pedestrian traffic from the surrounding areas and the line is frequently out the door; For good reason.

YZh75msskiOz8rna77Bbew.text: This place is super overrated. The waffle wasn't that good and the chicken was was deep fried all I felt like I was eating was batter. And I ordered a side of waffle fries and they brought me out a happy meal size order.   I don't know if I'll ever go back here since there isn't one near my house but if I have a choice between this and something else I will most likely go with the something else.

G7tdJSqiZFqQAv9x4Kw9Jw.text: This place was decently priced and waffles were good. I'm a huge waffle person, but I was not blown away by the actual flavor of the waffle itself. They get one star because there was a hair on my daughter's waffle. Bottom line is, the management did not apologize and said it was part of the waffle mix.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Unacceptable

-EsIm7hEiA6JLsDVka4YEw.text: Yummy chicken and waffles. I think I'm in love. Good price for what you get. Although the waffle doesn't hold up the fried chicken very well. Either you eat fast or... you have to pull it apart bc it will get soggy super quick from all that flavorful juice dripping out of the chicken. No it's not grease. It's juice!! Slightly in the salty side because they brine the meat. But it's everything you could ever want to cure a hang over.. not that I had one. Maple syrup. Solid!!  Mix some sriracha in that golden amber liquor and dip your chicken in.. so good. Promise!!! Friends don't lie!

v9FYPZnmEdfec3td0uFuqQ.text: If your visiting Vegas then you definitely need to stop here for breakfast or lunch. They have amazing chicken and waffle sandwiches or other waffle sandwiches. I ordered a Nutella & banana waffle sandwich with sweet cream it's was very fairly priced and the quality was excellent. My boyfriend ordered the original chicken sandwich! We both enjoyed our food!! Wish we had one in Tampa Florida

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Crispy chicken sandwich, and Nutella banana and sweet cream with strawberry lemonade!! Excellent

cU7IEFa_oOUC5W_CNHT6lw.text: This was my favorite spot from my Vegas trip loved the chicken waffles . Good service and delicious food
