rNib9Ux0Zeb1PPuKMxXaog.text: Was excited by the reviews. But I didn't like it. Thought it was too greasy. And the waffles were greasy too. Staff was nice.

qZPbsGaJf12p7L9lnkJAXQ.text: Loved this place. Waffle was nice and crispy and stayed that way after a few hours. The chicken was perfectly fried and seasoned. I had the BBQ honey sandwich with the onion straws. Awesome! Can't wait to return and try a different t sandwich.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

62xecJ6YQ2zT6yWwy7hh3A.text: Delicious! Try the fried pickles and pop a squat outside. The staff was so friendly and informative! Highly recommend.

rzvUDdAJrEmZjBg-QkyecQ.text: All I have to say is that this place is absolutely delicious !!! The Irish Nachos and the waffle with sweet cream, banana , and Nutella ... heaven ....

7HLOE9AwlMuT1Pw7IYSE7w.text: Literally came out of a six hour flight and found this was the closest place. I had the Holy Chicken, it's the BOMB.COM. Im staying here for the weekend and that's definitely going to be my go to place.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

gPEBbnMUOoADFSL7TCsAsQ.text: The chicken here is amazing! The taste and texture is perfect.  The waffles are the best I've ever had. I tried the waffles that had bacon inside as well as the ones that were filled with chocolate inside and they were both so good!. Will definitely be back to Bruxie in Vegas for the food!

p7gV53ln3zmHHiPVuXEE-g.text: Bruxie is soooo good ! Never fails , I would definitely recommend trying it . If you haven't already you don't know what your missing ! I have tried a couple items from the menu and everything is very tasty .

SUwYHqoL9j8fsV4CIlHARg.text: One of the best meals I had while staying in Vegas for a week! I had the original chicken & waffles.. it was amazing!! Don't skip on this place!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The original chicken &amp; waffles.. amazing!!

H8bCZq9jQV5nzHs2j5H2WQ.text: The Bruxie was a very chill place with a chill servers. The fried chicken was so good my boyfriend and I went back for another within the hour. Clean dining experience, outdoor seating available - pretty awesome for a fast food type of joint. We got the original fried chicken sandwich and then the buffalo fried chicken sandwich and both were so good without being too heavy. The waffles were light and airy and the chicken was soft and juicy. Definitely recommend this place if you have the chance to go.

COzzzUl5x7LJ__qkT7APpg.text: Yummy, yummy in our tummy.  Our first time having chicken and waffles, and it was delicious.  We will definitely go again.

n4RRL3kfMnMIvFe5SHVHHQ.text: Delicious, with pleasant and fast service.  We had the Crispy chicken, Green eggs and ham, as well as the Country sausage and egg. They were all tasty and varied in flavors.

UXDdNm917spbMPnfF0GAUw.text: Waffles!!! I believe I finally like eating waffles. This place and location makes it an ideal place to grab a tasty meal. Didn't know why I haven't try this place else where until recently. I'll definitely try other Bruxie locations from now onwards.

ASr1XiflefnSA9s7NbYPug.text: this was a great brunch place , i loved the creme brulee waffle! and the holy chicken sandwich was holy moly good! the service was awesome too, for great food and great service go here

tzVgUXdL2tm9i9_RP7d4_A.text: Bruxie does it all right. The place is well designed when you see it and it's always packed. I ordered the Crispy Chicken sandwich and it was delicious! The waffles they use are perfect for sandwiches and the chicken seasoning is perfect it's not so much flavor and it's not greasy like most chicken and waffles places. I also ordered the fried pickles and WOW are those so perfect! I got a foot bear float and that was were it wasn't good. They have it in a plastic cub and the ice cream was already melted when they gave it to me and it just looked gross. The taste of it was basically all root beer. The presentation of their food and the place itself is amazing so why not make the root beer float apart if that and have a cool design? Idk it's just a thought. The food was amazing and it's very fast service literally came out in 5 minutes. They have outside seating so you can enjoy the weather with great food. Can't wait to be back In Vegas to try something else at this place.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fried pickles with the crispy chicken!!

wucj57aqzDabdD8C0aMGfQ.text: Hipster McTrendy Superdream.  My wife and I showed up one morning right as they were opening.  To get a feel for what the place is all about, we ordered a signature buttermilk fried chicken waffle sandwich, one of the spicy fried chicken waffle sandwiches, some waffle fries, and a couple of coffees. What a fantastic place.  Both sandwiches were fantastic (I really liked the slaw and chili honey on the original), the waffle fries were great, and the coffee was awesome.  For the price, this is the best deal on the strip (particularly if you are staying in New York New York, it's next door).  The service was excellent, and I can't imagine NOT visiting this place the next time I'm trying to kill a hangover in Vegas.

yeeXIdhjTGwHSwkR-q8sjA.text: Killer chicken and waffles @ 10 bucks each. I would vote best fast lunch off the strip. The batter the waffle all homemade with great flavors for you to discover.

gR9tu5v315Gk8rg2CRMweg.text: Great place to visit in Vegas! Simple, but delicious menu that will have you craving more. Lines may be long, but wait is not bad! Give it a try!

r14ftkLVWpbJ8b8cpOLrdQ.text: We went here back in June and it was great. We came back again today, the food and service went down hill. They served burnt waffle. I'm amazed how both the cook and the server still actually brought it out to serve customer burnt waffle.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Burnt waffle
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Burnt waffle served

38iqXoEPDKa8WIMdR8MDgQ.text: Had the buffalo chicken blue cheese waffle sandwich looks visually appetizing but did not satisfy tastewise. The ingredients dont work together, better off deconstructing the sandwich before eating eat.. wish I had done so before i reached the last few bites.

SZf70IDFURlCmHdQLLzu1Q.text: The best chicken and waffles I've ever had. We tried both the original sandwich and the crispy sandwich. The crispy was our favorite-a more traditional savory chicken. The original was also delicious with a sweet vinegar sauce that goes nicely with the waffles. The waffles have a nice light texture that's different than regular waffles and the hand made sodas are also amazing!

lXLJEZuzfRGYWZL_RxgSmw.text: Oh man I wish I had taken a picture of this place but since I left Vegas it has been on my mind  so delicious!

UwjHwdoxtbNq8v8qYUgoMQ.text: Great location, just outside of New-York New York. We are outside at the tables set up at the park. I got the Holy Waffle Sandwich, it was tasty but super messy to try to eat. He got the Nashville Chicken Sandwich, which was very good but also very messy to try to eat. We shared the Irish Nachos, for me these were amazing. Overall good experience, would go back, but next time Wet Wipes will have to be brought with.

JL6mCj9pvwka-LQxwjil2Q.text: Got there just as they opened - no line and we had food in about 4 minutes. There was a line of 20 people out the door by 9:30, though, so go early or during off peak times.  Waffles were delicious -light and fluffy on their own, a bit more solid when served with the chicken.

Aq04u-LnkHb8gdLLoq9QMQ.text: Awesome food and really affordable . Skip Starbucks for your coffee because it's cheaper and tastes way better plus you can get a waffle at the same time.

WvkFxvmkRdv-TfQ-Qhdy8A.text: Amazing Nashville hot chicken and waffle sandwich I had.  Not super hot, amazing flavor Sat outside a few nights ago and it was perfect temperature.  Not super busy at 10 pm when we got there  A must try place!

6BRCxKyc2_e9Qg12OAXbIw.text: Chicken and waffles - sweet or spicy, they are making it and making it deliciously. The waffle is thinner and crisper than your typical waffle, making it the perfect vehicle to hold your fried chicken. It's the perfect stop if you want a less fancy but super tasty bite to eat.

OjyzNrdQ1F7FRtULgBqjGA.text: It's not too often that you come across a True 5 star place. This is it. Both me and my wife loved this place.  The food is unique and done great.  I never thought of mixing fried chicken and waffles and actually thought it might be gross.  This is definitely worth a try.  We ordered the Original and both loved it.

piQrZDxfkEBPf6gHrhA3FA.text: I got the chicken and waffle. The cheddar bacon waffle was crisp on the outside yet fluffy on the inside....beyond delicious! The chicken was boneless. I didn't care for a thigh so instead of a thigh and a breast, I got a breast and a half. The chicken was crispy, slightly spicy. The syrup and maple butter over the meal was delicious and not over powering. I am not really a condiment person either. The store was clean and the staff was patient and helpful. The food does take a few minutes but is hot and fresh. Yum!

vz_EGNQ012nKpvskuV2gMg.text: This place speaks for its self. Dre is super friendly and very attentive he got our food out to us super fast and made sure we were good at all times. Now for the food it was really good and moist the it was a lot of food for a little bit of money, I should have gotten a kids meal.. but the visit was well worth it and we will definitely be back when we decide to visit Vegas again.

8s5Y0B5e76wBMlOj0DHHTQ.text: The best waffle I've had, for it to have chrddar and bacon in it,  out was surprisingly sweet, didn't need syrup. The chicken is nicely seasoned as well. The mac and cheese was just average. Highly recommend this place.

rznyDxAHwtJbfLeo5FMd_g.text: Cute fast food restaurant. There was a line but it moved really quickly. We tried the original Fried Chicken waffle sandwich AMAZING so tasty ! The Tito's lemonade perfect for a hot day

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

d-lc7ziMAjMyQNwGwkrmIg.text: I literally come to Vegas for their chicken waffle sandwiches. So good and the perfect mix of sweet and savory. I like how the waffle is thinner and more crispy than others stores. Cute decor too.

QuVG6eitGy0SVc1eVcuPbA.text: The most amazing chicken and waffles I ever had! Even though the service was horrible and it took a decade and a half to get my food and even my drink (I was cotton mouthed as a mug) I'm still giving it 5 stars because it made me grateful to be alive! Whoever made my meal can get it! Heavy!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

mgHTnYidEG26pH_amznBQg.text: This place was amazing!!! The maple syrup was a perfect match for this combination. Strongly recommend them. My husband and I went right after a VGK game. They were super friendly and the service was in a timely manner. A gentleman came around to ask if everyone was doing well and if we needed anything. Now, the real question is when can they open a location in my neighborhood? Lol. I will definitely be returning soon :)

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 2 piece and waffles combo with strawberry lemonade

Cp4aq37z43axBIltP59mLQ.text: I usually don't go for chicken and waffles but this place changed me. I came here on a Tuesday around dinner time and there was a long line that reached the door. After ordering, the food came out pretty quickly. My friend and I shared the original fried chicken & waffle sandwich as well as the kickin fried chicken tenders. The chicken is drenched in this sweet and spicy syrup which was just absolutely delicious. The waffle was very light, crunchy, and buttery. The tenders had a good amount of spice to it and was super crispy which I liked. The waffle fries and pickles were a good addition as well. I'm back in Seattle now and I still think about that chicken sandwich.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

5JEf0ro3oYfE66PVsoO3yg.text: Amazing! The line was a little long getting in, but once we got in it was smooth. Ordered the Holy Shit, with no bacon, egg fried hard. Had a side of chicken tenders and waffle fries too. Everything was good! I will definitely go back the next time I'm in Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holy Shit no bacon , egg fried hard. Waffle fries and strawberry shake.
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Strawberry shake
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holy Shit no bacon. Egg fried hard. Chicken tenders and waffle fries

-a2XWDOeq--LhopPcYUz7A.text: Have no complaints whatsoever! Great place, great vibe, great food! First let me say this know, some people will just not like the combination of the sweet waffles and syrup with savory chicken. Some people are just not big fans. But I do highly recommend that you try it and that you try it here. Waffle had amazing consistency and texture against the crispy very well seasoned chicken. The sweet maple syrup ties the whole sandwich together and the sticky sweet crunchy contrast was amazing. I kept it simple with the chicken and waffle sandwich and that's all it needed. The location is also very nice because it's right on the Park and there's a lot of things to do right outside. They do have their own sitting area outside as well as inside but the location and the good food just brings the whole thing to a really chill vibe. Highly recommended!

ktvIWaS_amOzK4GcveQXZw.text: Best waffles I've ever tasted! Crispy, sweet, dusted with powered sugar. The chicken was good, well cooked and lots of flavor. Would highly recommend this place for a quite meal on the strip!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ubcqBmAimdFdvEzo8ODVaA.text: That was a good idea. The waffle is light the chicken is full of flavor and the sauce is spicy and sweet. So good!!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

cC7FSF-SE1RdmvQaZRMOyw.text: We ordered a chicken waffle sandwich to go from Bruxie.  I think they also have a location in SD as well.  The waffle was good and the chicken was flavorful. It is best to eat it fresh obviously so the waffle doesn't get soggy.   Overall, not a bad place if you are craving chicken and waffle.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Holy chicken

2FqxO-bJapD0AcXn2d6Gng.text: Visiting from Houston. I had the 2 piece chicken with half of a bacon cheddar waffle. The cheddar in the waffle was rather interesting but it was OK. The chicken was the absolute BOMB though!! Wish there was a Houston location!

xmuHJGB3zXgf7UcHtD7_yg.text: Crisp yet fluffy waffles. Tender, juicy chicken. Made into one amazing sandwich...literally what more could you ask for!? Came here with my girls for a quick lunch. I split The Original and added a side of fries with my friend. It was just enough for us to be satisfied, but not stuffed. I need a Bruxie on every street corner!

bCRdNAeyDwqRHvJsFddItg.text: Absolutely LOVED Bruxie'! Truly unique brunch and the waffle, fried chicken, egg, and bacon sandwiched together was probably the best I've ever had. Even the lemonade was amazing. If you're in Vegas, I highly suggest you have brunch here!

b4BjQ3q0Id5_BNkG4xYveQ.text: Amazing waffle sandwiches.  Fast lines and service, compact seating but tables open quick.  Great for lunch or breakfast.  Had the BAMF and the Banaana/Nutella sandwiches.  The chicken was excellent with a glob of mac n cheese on top which took it to a new level.  The nutella sandwich is sweet and savory.  I split these two sandwiches with a date, very filling, so dont let your eyes get bigger than your stomach.  I would probably get a regular and a desert to split for two people.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BAMF and the nutella and banana sandwiches

AIesn02quwnQZjcwpp1aGg.text: Highly recommend the 2 piece because the waffle it comes with is scrumptious and better than the plain waffles the sandwiches come on. And 2 was way more than I could eat so if you are just one person I wouldn't go for 3. The butter is super sweet and mapley so don't go thinking you're going to need any additional syrup. You will not! I only wish the iced coffee options had been a bit more robust and it would be cool if they offered some hotter chicken but it was delicious as is with the chili honey drizzle! My husband got the holy whatever it's called sandwich and it was wonderful also. The Sriracha sauce was not just plain Sriracha, it was this delicious creamy substance. It was tasty altogether but looked quite challenging to eat! We arrived at 10ish on a Sunday and the line was only about 10 minutes. Friendly, fun service too!   When we walked up I was thinking this place looks like it's just going to be hipster overrated but it turned out to be as good as the reviews suggest.

Sw79tlOs82_cuMDrq9wl1A.text: Absolutely delicious! We loved it there! The food is unique and very flavorful. An absolute delight!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Wifey and me!
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Delicious!!!!
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Amazing!!!!

VMiemVWO_rfSnZVVpic8JA.text: OMG! The Holy Chicken is unbelievably delicious. Crunchy, soft. Spicy, salty, and sweet. It's got ALL THE THINGS happening. In every bite. The waffle is the perfect vessel to soak up all of the yummy goodness. Calling it a sandwich is a bit of a stretch since it definitely requires a knife and a fork but they call it whatever they want. It's that good!

DAC6sXGh1I2oYajqCBdk1w.text: The waffle was so thing and buttery. The fried pickles were sweeter then I thought they would be but fired well. The chicken was also nice and crunchy.  I felt like I was covered in oils at the end of the meal but I'd do it again.  Prices also good for what you are getting, not inflated Vegas prices.

0HGi1DXyp_GgJ-CX8WtZRg.text: In my DJ Khaled voice, ANOTHER ONE! Just like almost every spot I ate at another 5  experience. I had the green eggs & ham (not even a fan of arugula or pesto) but it looked amazing so I said why not!? Best choice I made it was super tasty, and the strawberry brulee slider was a nice addition to the meal. Didn't like the vanilla shake and upon an employee asking how my meal was they recommended I try the strawberry shake which they replaced for me free of charge and it was SLAMMING!!!! Highly advise stopping by for a bite if you get the chance.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

GQaAZqexdNNiGO9uQv7yug.text: Delicious fried chicken! Waffles are soft and fluffy, and the chicken has an amazing coating on it-nice and thick and crispy! The portions are HUGE though, and very filling. I would recommend sharing an order and go from there... on the pricier side but it is right on the strip. Their waffle fries are also amazing, make sure you get their ranch to dip with!

jD473h8wi36qdwzdPztoZQ.text: I was there last night and I had to write a  Review because the food there is amazing,the waffle I had was the naked bruxie waffle i add powdered sugar and it was yummy and also the service was excellent so much excitement when you walk in the restaurant. Thanks i will come back soon

qYY_WiFl4xZyyICft160uw.text: I was there Tuesday and I loved there service especially The supervisor she was so nice to me and my family her name is Cecily I will definitely be coming back soon great service keep it up!!!

Y7AaPW4bsrP8WptGlYtHoA.text: Came here due to the raving reviews. When we saw the menu we almost turned away bc it wasn't food we typically eat. However, we stayed to try something different and so glad we did. The food and service was wonderful! There was a long line out the door- but it went by quickly and well worth it.

mPdE_YIIyvJmMUXmAQZlSg.text: Fried foods... the guilty pleasure that spurs on heart attacks and gluttony... the most satisfyingly greasy meals ever... Let's add Bruxie and their fried chicken and waffles to the list of fried heaven. The fried chicken and cheddar-bacon Waffle combo was a winner, mixing sweetness and savory together into the perfect pairing! Add some fries to complete your day of gluttony and get to the gym the following day! If you're more health-oriented, order the salad... with fried chicken, of course! Savor the fried chicken and waffles options while taking a break from the buffets in Las Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

JaQiar02vPsT5pemhfdBMA.text: I really don't understand how this place has 4.5 stars? Original chicken sandwich was pretty flavorful but my top waffle was completely cold. The fried chicken cobb salad that my husband ordered was pretty good, especially because they were generous with the avocado and the bacon. However, his chicken had less seasoning than mine in the sandwich, so it was a bit bland. It's okay, and reasonably priced for the Strip ($12 for a sandwich), but definitely nothing to write home about.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fried chicken Cobb.  mmmmmm.
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Original

U_fwgB4sSg6t2LhOzqLBkQ.text: Loved the concept, essentially chicken and waffle sandwiches. I got the kicking chicken combo. Waffle is a bit thinner than usual with the traditional dish but that what makes the sandwich work. Like the fries, the waffle was super crisp on the outside but fluffy inside. Liked the chicken but could have been way spicier. Drowning the chicken with extra cholula did the trick.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

7rDrd9LLPb0YmfUYEb5fBQ.text: My friend and I shared the Irish nachos and the original 3 piece chicken with the bacon cheddar waffle. The chicken was definitely the star - so tender! The syrup paired well. The Irish nachos were good but the sauce was a bit overpowering and made the fries soggy if you wait a bit to eat it. The portions were huge as well. We only ate half the food and felt stuffed! Coming back to Bruxie to try a waffle chicken sandwich and all the other things on menu next time!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Irish nachos and original chicken with bacon cheddar waffle

y1CA5lXW8J2tWbgGhAC3rw.text: Had the Holy chicken breakfast sandwich with the spicy tots soooooo good! The waffle was tasty as was the chicken! It was big enough for 2 of us to share. Can't wait to go back and try one of the other sandwich options.

VGw75rxaNgWLqUZTbIHdAg.text: If your looking for a quick bite and saving money while in town, this is your place! A whole lot of fresh flavor and great comfort food. I had 2 different waffle sandwiches and both were delicious. The fried chicken itself was well seasoned and perfectly cooked. The waffles are light and surprisingly taste great as bread substitutes for sandwich making. Also the sauces in the sandwich really seal the deal, making this a great spot for good eats!

etedyozvZ22aYMqqDJfe6A.text: The food was pretty delicious! The strawberry lemonade was perfect for this hot day! The bacon-cheddar waffle had the perfect amount of bacon bits and cheddar. The chicken was tender and flavorful.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

42H1n3ibfhj_JPgDxrB6zg.text: This is the best place ever!! Ever since we tried it the first time we have had to come back twice every time we are in Vegas. The food is incredible and their shakes are amazing! Best breakfast place in Vegas if you are looking for a quick bite. Super large portions and very savoury! The staff are super nice as well.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States

D4LmqomBtJpEWRz3GRb-Bw.text: Yum! Wanting a chicken Waffle combo? Search no more... Order the holy chicken sandwich and prepare for your eyes to roll to the back of your head.  It's that good

_qnFzHexCO8SCRSq18pUdQ.text: I didn't think i would enjoy this as much as i did, i ordered the green eggs and ham which is a waffle loaded with ham, two eggs and pesto, i also added avocado. I thought it would be sweet or just too heavy for breakfast but it was not heavy or sweet just delicious! I loved the crunch you get from the waffle.

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Green Eggs &amp; Ham: Grilled ham, two eggs, pesto.  Extra added avocado

uVGD1E-E4dyAWmSWVVOWeQ.text: Came here on a Monday around 7:30PM. The line wasn't that long.   I really like the design of this place. It feels like I'm eating outdoors but I'm really not. Loving the huge open windows and high ceilings.  I ordered the the Carolina BBQ Pulled Pork and that sandwich was amazing. I never had a sandwich on a waffle before. I was surprised how soft the waffle was and decent the portion they gave.  Service was excellent and offered to refill our drinks several times so that was a plus. I really like the music they played also

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carolina pulled pork

Zo8Z99WWY9u_tynz8AuMog.text: Just Yum. Don't let the line discourage you. Worth all the waits. If your splitting something get an extra egg to make it worth it. Love a Vegas place that serves Titos as a proud Texan.

MRscs6ftMDikakjr6fKH0w.text: With the grand opening of The Park, I KNEW I wanted Bruxie to be the first place I tried especially coming from California where it is widely loved and craved. Walked in and there were two employees that immediately approached us to talk to us about the menu and what's popular. Nice gesture! (o:  We were able to try the Original Buttermilk Chicken and waffles (with a side of waffle fries, nom!) and the Carolina BBQ Chicken Waffle. For drinks, we had the Arnold Palmer and Strawberry Lemonade.    The BC&W was okaaaay. The chicken itself is TOO sweet for my taste and even though it looks like a generous size chicken, it didn't feel as if it was big enough. The BBQ was so great! With or without the sauce, the pulled pork was really taste but I would suggest drowning your waffle + meat in their BBQ sauce! When you purchase a drink, it's refillable so it's def WORTH IT. Wasn't really a fan of the Arnold Palmer but the Strawberry lemonade was soOoo bomb!!!   Overall, all the food was pretty filling...but for some odd reason, it wasn't quite satisfying.BUT the waffle fries were so good that I'm definitely going to be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Original buttermilk fried chicken and waffle + waffle fries
Photo of Bruxie - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carolina BBQ Chicken

LktxGUw1g6h23rYHQm-bIw.text: I got the kickin chicken sandwich. I could only eat half. It was good, but only "good". Not amazing. Didn't blow my socks off but it was good and fresh. The waffles are thin and crispy. The chicken is fried well and juicy. I say the sandwich is only "good" because I didn't get much spice from the chicken. I'd like the chicken to have nice flavor on its own but it didn't, especially for a spicy sandwich. The service was fast and friendly. Price was 12 for a single sandwich. That's a lot but it is the Vegas strip and kind of a fun trendy concept so I understand the cost. Not bad. I'd like to go back and try their waffle fries and a few other things but today I was solo so I only tired one item on the menu. It's worth stopping by.

vyqKNe3DqmTrWkTELHTkLw.text: Got the Holy Chicken and Crispy Chicken Sandwich, damn it was worth the parking fees. Have to enter into NYNY parking structure and walk down to the Park. Will be back for sure!

QH686hARBlLDBYzn5uRPcw.text: I don't see what the fuss was all about with this place. A waffle sandwich/taco thingy that rips up your mouth while you eat it and the only way to make it less dry is to douse it with syrup was not my cup of tea. If you want to try chicken and waffles for the first time, you'll probably like this place because chicken and waffles are amazing anyway. But specifically this place didn't do anything for me.

Sh9h21_LIxX8s1-DtHadNg.text: Bruxie the fancy waffle and chicken! I've been to the one in Orange County. Which of course was a new thing and it was crowded. Here it wasn't so bad. It was crowded but not what I expected. I don't mind since I wanted to check it out again. And yes I was craving some sweet and savory. I could have gone to Hash house but I wanted something different. Don't get me wrong my heart is still with the OG Roscoe's Chicken and Waffles. I am a LA girl but LV is my home. So the closest I can get to RC&W is here. OK OK I should really find something not so fancy. But anyways! It wasn't so bad. I really like the strawberry lemonade. Not bad Bruxie! Not bad!   The chicken was very tasty, juicy and the crunch sound was good. I do wish it was crunchier. The waffle was good but my waffle got really soft and eeeeh after awhile. And that I didn't put to much syrup.  It's a biscuit waffle infused with bacon covered in fried chicken with a honey chili flavored maple syrup. My friend got The Original Fried Chicken & waffle.  It had some wonderful honey chili maple syrup on the chicken. The waffle fries was good, nothing wow about that. I feel that the sandwich needed something not just little coleslaw in it. OH well it was still yummie.   Would I come back here? Sure to try new things here at Bruxie.

FTtGtZzk3yAAVr1IYQ91Bg.text: I had heard a lot of buzz about this place before coming down for this latest trip to Vegas.   It did not disappoint.   I had the Holy Chicken or something along those lines - I think it may have been a special? Either way, it was delicious. Someone else has the Bruxie Burger, which looked amazing, and the Crispy Chicken Tenders and Fries (which yes, is an item on the kids menu) - although, he still said it was really good. We also shared some deep fried pickles - which were HUGE. Too big for my liking, it felt like each bite was 1/3 of a jumbo pickle.   The line was huge and didn't move too quickly, but once ordering the food came out (and was delivered to the table) quite quickly. Despite it being busy, the five of us were able to grab a table just fine.  I'll be back - but not soon enough I'm afraid!

rfu4SMjQgd9afBl5n1zxCw.text: Absolutely amazing.  Some of the best chicken and waffles (in sandwich form) I've ever had.  Counter service.  The Irish Nachos were also a hit.

4rsRDM0hM6wNvg8NoPgGAA.text: Delicious! That's all I have to say! Good hangover cure. Maybe a little more expensive than your average brunch spot, but it's Vegas... Check it out!

_cJ9iuDcm9JoQBS8gGZ7Lw.text: The food was unique and very good. The waffles are more of a bread type. They are light and Airy. They also have thick waffles which I ordered. The chicken is crispy and kind of spicy for the most part. The prices can get a bit expensive if you don't watch yourself. The staff is great and very helpful for the first time customer. Enjoy one of the good restaurants near the strip.

mFj9a20pVtR2FuADEqmnLw.text: I came here for lunch and I gotta say, their chicken was extremely flavorful! Every bite is packed with seasoning and it was very tender and juicy. I got the original chicken and waffles and enjoyed my meal. However, I am not a huge fan of their waffles. They put a lot of sugar in their waffles which was a turn off for me because I did not want to eat sugar for lunch. Their waffle fries were average and tasty but had a little more salt than I expected.  I ordered one meal which was enough for me and one other person. It was extremely filling and I wish I got a chance to try their dessert because it looked amazing. I would definitely come here again but would not order a waffle with sugar on it.

Rm9SGDRAkBF9pBaN7H1tjQ.text: The food was OK, I ordered the naked waffle which taste great and was light but was cold, my bf ordered the kicking chicken waffle sandwich and was just OK as well we kind of expected more as we are from the south so any variation of chicken and waffles should be a good combo just wasn't exactly what  we expecting but not awful. It was cool to try wouldn't come again though

OD8BxoiUZqi_71oMSLN6kQ.text: That was horrible. I order the hot Louisiana chicken sandwich. It wasn't even spicy. If you've ever had Howlin Rays in Los Angeles, CA you would know what I mean. It was a huge disappointment. You would think for something to get 4.5 stars in Vegas it'd be good. The waffle was alright and that could be because the sandwich was blah. I would skip this on your next trip.

HX2uL9gFDAFQM1StfB9Hsw.text: So good. My husband and I split a combo that came with a sandwich, fries and an ices coffee for $19. So, very pricey, but that's the strip for you. I loved the sandwich though and the staff was nice.

9Q-9uVUsyhfxTjueEWaI1g.text: This place was.....amazing! The service was friendly, the view was excellent, and the food was fantastic. Definitely check this place out.

XHux2lSWAcra_LSkvdpuhw.text: Such a fun place! Took me a minute to find--entrance is outside on the street not through the casino to way it was trying to lead me. I cannot wait to come back and try ALL the food in the menu!

OfxTBh1Ufvh-bARlhyBx4w.text: This place is solid.. great chicken.. and great waffles.. go with the 2 chicken plate if u want more chicken (u only get a half a waffle).. get the sandwich if u want more waffles

OdJ0QzoefMgcuChxrLDN8g.text: Highly highly recommend this place to anyone and everyone. It's is located right outside of where Shake Shack is and I tried this place out right after eating there and it simply blew me away.   I didn't try the chicken and waffles which I heard this place is known for but man their dessert waffles are amazing. I tried the Creme Brulee and it was the best waffle dessert I have ever had.   Even on a full stomach this place was delicious. Would for sure come back here again without a doubt.  Seating is okay, not a ton but not small.

th-UjxPuftiut264KWuNCw.text: TL;DR: Amazing waffles, I would go with the Original Fried Chicken and Waffle. Imho, not worth the price, but definitely should be experienced once!  First of all, parking for the Park complex was complicated for me (as is all parking in Vegas) because there is no designated parking for "The Park". Or at least, I couldn't find any. I just parked in New York New York, but still had to walk quite a bit to get there. (Note: Don't valet; do self-parking. Valet costs $13 here....?!?!?! Costs more than the waffles..)  The waffles themselves are one of the best! I got the Original, which was amazing! Not worth the price in my opinion, but tastes really good. The waffle fries are overpriced; just get them from Chick-Fil-A. I also got the bare waffles, which were good on their own! My mom got the lemon cream (?) and berries. It was overly sweet. I am a huge fan of lemon curd, but wow I swear my teeth were forming cavities while I took a bite. The waffles were also soggy from the curd... So I wouldn't recommend this one unless you've got an immense sweet tooth.   Service was slow, but I understand that good food sometimes takes time. Overall a decent experience. :)

jN0oXt6OcWQN8aCc33gQEQ.text: This place is very delicious, a little pricey but worth a try.  Although the music is very loud, I enjoyed the food.

U4Lc0D6xyAoEVs5f7Byr3Q.text: What a find this place was!  We were staying at NYNY and ended up here out of convenience, but ended up coming back a second time, and almost a third.The food is really good, the staff is uber-friendly, your order comes out fast, they have lots of seating... and it's all priced reasonable.  Bruxie checks all the boxes. Must go.

EdCl8pyAhVtNY9aN6hL8ag.text: This place is amazing. This may seem pricey but when you get the actual food you realize your paying for an entire meal wrapped in a waffle

zwg5HvpUqmcZWMo8mEMb9Q.text: Really good food! Amazing chicken and waffles. Good little brunch place when visiting Las Vegas.

iXpnf829EU6aEItjdshKkQ.text: service--very friendly and helpful.  order taker was nice and cared about me being happy. and there was a nice young man who went around asking if i wanted another cup of water--good kudos to that african american young man who was working hard on 12/19 at 1130 am.  quick tips:  maybe just get the basic waffles and basic fried chicken.  why?  the beauty of chicken and waffles is the yin/yang balance of sweet/yeasty with savory/meaty.  the hot sauces--and the buffalo sauce are True to form in their spicy/salty notes--but it's jhust too overwhelming.  in addition, the buffalo chicken version has a generous sprinkling of blue cheese.  while i appreciate the healthily big piece of chicken, it's just out of balance. there's just way too much salt in the sauce and too much cheese/hot sauce overwhelming the balance. the waffle is lost--it's just basically an overshadowed flimsy carb, instead of a delightful, equal partner.  i won't say no to going here--but i'll just stick with the basic fried chicken/waffle combo. i'm surprised that this place has such high reviews. i'd chalk this up to mostly novelty.   also, last small note--i've read from others that the waffle fries are a big soggy. mine were acceptably not soggy.  it was interesting that my container of waffle fries was filled with tiny remnants--not a bad outcome as by volume, i had a lot more potato than if it had only been filled with full size pieces.  as usual--i felt a bit pressured to finish well within an hour to avoid paying parking fees at the NY NY garage. so i'm sorry--but minus half a star for making me worry about paying for parking in las vegas.

2OzhG_xMS3gfjA3rrFZddA.text: The Bruxie is a nice chicken and waffle restaurant. I love the uniqueness of the place. I ordered the bbq chicken waffle sandwich, I didn't like it. Next time I will just order a breakfast sandwich or plain waffle. If you like waffles (who doesn't) I suggest giving this place a try.

EtJm-5TPn96wKAYhLhSF4Q.text: Delicious chicken and waffles! The mac and cheese was tasty . Big crunchy waffle fries ... yum. The salad was ok , you can say we ordered alot on the menu to try. Overall good experiance .
